zhuā diǎnxíng 
grasp typical cases

a typical instance (or case)

This problem is very typical, and should be treated seriously.

所有人都认为他们般配，说他们是典型的才子佳人。

每逢皇帝生日或者其他庆典，诸侯群臣皆要朝贺。

All other countries must come and pay their respect for all emperial birthdays, and celebrations.
这些承典的物品都很贵重，大家一定要小心。
Zhèxiē chéngdiǎn de wùpǐn dōu hěnguìzhòng，dàjiā yídìng yào xiǎoxīn。
These mortgaged items are valuable, please be careful with them.
洪湖赤卫队是中国典型的群众武装组织。
Hónghú chìwèduì shì Zhōngguó diǎnxíng de qúnzhòng wǔzhuāng zǔzhī。
The Honghu Red Guards were typical of China\'s civil armed organizations.
这些成语的出典要认真确定，不能出错。
Zhèxiē chéngyǔ de chūdiǎn yào rènzhēn quèdìng，bùnéng chūcuò。
We must carefully confirm the derivation of these phrases, and make sure we don\'t make any mistakes.
他们的生活大不如从前了，现在只能出典一些土地来维持生活。
Tāmen de shēnghuó dà bùrú cóngqián le，xiànzài zhǐnéng chūdiǎn yìxiē tǔdì lái wéichí shēnghuó。
They live a much worse life than before. Now they can only support themselves by mortgaging some land.
这个词条在两本词典中的意思不太一致。
Zhège cítiáo zài liǎng běn cídiǎn zhōng de yìsi bú tài yízhì。
This entry is not exactly the same in two different dictionaries.
《辞海》和《辞源》都是大型的汉语词典。
《Cíhǎi》hé《Cíyuán》dōushì dàxíng de hànyǔ cídiǎn。
Both Cihai and Ciyuan are large-scale Chinese dictionaries.
开业典礼所需要的东西，我替你措办。
Kāiyè diǎnlǐ suǒ xūyào de dōngxi，wǒ tì nǐ cuòbàn。
I will make preparations for whatever needed for the opening ceremony for you.
我们将在大后天举行开业庆典。
Wǒmen jiāng zài dàhòutiān jǔxíng kāiyè qìngdiǎn。
The opening celebration will be held the day after tomorrow.

Tāmen fùzé zhèxiē diǎncè de zhěnglǐ gōngzuò。
He is in charge of putting these ancient books and records in order.
文艺作品中应当着力塑造典型化人物。
Wényì zuòpǐn zhōng yīngdāng zháolì sùzào diǎnxínghuà rénwù。
Literary works should focus on portraying typical people.
这个问题太具有典型性了，应该认真对待。
Zhège wèntí tài jùyǒu diǎnxíngxìng le，yīnggāi rènzhēn duìdài。
This problem is very typical, and should be treated seriously.
你有没有电子版的英汉字典？
Nǐ yǒu méiyǒu diànzǐbǎn de yīnghàn zìdiǎn？
Have you got an electronic English-Chinese dictionary?
这个电子书库收录了大量的中国古代典籍。
Zhège diànzǐ shūkù shōulù le dàliàng de Zhōngguó gǔdài diǎnjí。
This electronic library contains a great number of ancient Chinese books.
那些风中轻飘的飞蓬，是植物界随遇而安的典型。
Nàxiē fēng zhōng qīngpiāo de fēipéng，shì zhíwùjiè suíyù\'ér\'ān de diǎnxíng。
The bitter fleabane in the wind is a typical drifting plant.
他博览群书，精通坟典。
Tā bólǎn qúnshū，jīngtōng féndiǎn。
He reads quite extensively and knows a lot about the classics.
《天鹅湖》被奉为芭蕾舞剧的经典。
《Tiān\'éhú》bèi fèngwéi bālěiwǔjù de jīngdiǎn。
&quot;Swan Lake&quot; is honored as one of the classic ballets.
想了解佛教，必须先读佛典。
Xiǎng liǎojiě fójiào，bìxū xiān dú fódiǎn。
One must read the Buddhist classics to get to know Buddhism.
他通过研读佛家经典来领会佛家思想。
Tā tōngguò yándú fójiā jīngdiǎn lái lǐnghuì fójiā sīxiǎng。
He tries to comprehend Buddhist ideas by studying the Buddhist classics.
在大宴群臣的时候，皇帝将贡酒赐予有功之臣以示恩典。

目前，她有充足的志愿者候补。
A relief pitcher took over in the top of the fifth.
Hòubǔ tóushǒu zài dì-wǔ jú de zuìhòu shàngchǎng。
候补投手在第五局的最后上场。
I will step into the breach in his absence.
Tā bú zài de shíhou，wǒ huì bǔ tā de quē。
他不在的时候，我会补他的缺。
He got a pair of kings in the draw.
Tā zài bǔ pái de shíhou chōu dào yíduì lǎo K。
他在补牌的时候抽到一对老K。
At that point, the stock market cannot be subsidised any more.
dào nàgèshíhòu，gǔshì jiù zàiyě débúdào bǔtiē。
到那个时候，股市就再也得不到补贴。
如果你饿了，就先点补一下吧。
Rúguǒ nǐ è le，jiù xiān diǎnbǔ yíxià ba。
Eat some food before the meal if you are hungry.
学习别人的优点，弥补自己的不足
Xuéxí biéren de yōudiǎn，míbǔ zìjǐ de bùzú。
learn from other people\'s strong points to counteract one\'s own weaknesses
我们应当学习他们的强点来弥补自己的弱点。
Wǒmen yīngdāngxuéxí tāmen de qiángdiǎn lái míbǔ zìjǐ de ruòdiǎn。
We should learn from their strong points to offset our weak ones.
她经常加班加点为学生补课，但却从不要求学生回报。
Tā jīngcháng jiābān jiādiǎn wèi xuésheng bǔkè，dàn què cóng bú yāoqiú xuésheng huíbào。
She always worked extra hours to make up missed lessons for the students, but never asked for something in return.
他被车撞了，有点血虚，要补补身体。
Tā bèi chē zhuàng le，yǒudiǎn xuèxū，yào bǔbǔ shēntǐ。
He should take more nourishing food, as his blood is deficient due to the car accident.
多喝点汤又滋补又养人。
Duō hē diǎn tāng yòu zībǔ yòu yǎngrén。
Drink more soup, it\'s nourishing and nutritious.
你的身体太差了，多吃点营养品补补。
Nǐ de shēntǐ tài chà le，duō chī diǎn yíngyǎngpǐn bǔbǔ。
You are too feeble and should have more nourishment for your body.
最后的复习阶段，我们重点进行查缺补漏。
Zuìhòu de fùxí jiēduàn，wǒmen zhòngdiǎn jìnxíng cháquē bǔlòu。
At the last stage of our preparation for the test, we will focus on locating and making up for deficiencies.
请点一下，不够再找补。
Qǐnɡ diǎn yíxià, búɡòu zài zhǎobu。 
Count it, please. We\'ll make it up if there\'s any shortage.
听说核桃仁儿可以补脑，你应该多吃点。
Tīngshuō hétáorénr kěyǐ bǔnǎo，nǐ yīnggāi duō chī diǎn。
It is said that the walnut kernel can nourish the brain, so you should eat  a lot of them.
先吃点儿点心点补一下。
他手头正紧，需要大家搭补点儿。
先吃块点心垫补一下吧。
分量不够，再找补点儿。
除此之外，我再补充两点意见。
除正常上班外，他还要去挣点活钱儿贴补家用。
可以拿出一点公益金贴补困难户。
Her sense of humor has to be a saving grace.
Tā de yōumògǎn bìxū chéngwéi yíxiàng kěyǐ míbǔ quēdiǎn de yōudiǎn。
她的幽默感必须成为一项可以弥补缺点的优点。
more can be said
还可以补充一点
a saving grace
可取之处，足以补偿其他缺点的长处
Her speed and determination cancels out all of her other weaknessess.
Tā de sùdù hé juéxīn míbǔle suǒyǒu qítā quēdiǎn。
她的速度和决心弥补了所有其他缺点。

Nà liǎng gè měilì de shèjì bèi xuǎnlái bǔzú hūnlǐ de fēnggé。

酌予补助
zhuó yǔ bǔzhù 
give some financial assistance

The needy usually may ask for relief.
公司体念你的实际困难，发给你两千元钱做为补助。

The company fully understands your financial difficulties, here is 2000 yuan for you.
公司的误餐补助是每年年底一次性发放的。
Gōngsī de wùcān bǔzhù shì měinián niándǐ yícìxìng fāfàng de。
The company\'s meal allowance are handed out at the end of the year.
学校每月补助他们200美元。

这家公司批准了贾森对于住房补助的申请。

他拒绝提供她的周补助。
This is the routine for gaining the financial aid.
这是获得财政补助的例行手续。

补助金的发放正在有序进行。
We will abolish student loans and restore student entitlement to housing benefit and income support.

The foreign travel allowance is $85 per day.
Hǎiwài chūchāi bǔzhù shì měitiān 86 měiyuán。
海外出差补助是每天86美元。
Perks such as company cars and allowances for newspapers and TV are common.

额外补贴——如公司轿车、报纸和电视补助等，是很普遍的。
However，a small amount of money should be laid aside for travel grants.
Bùguǎn zěnyàng，yào liúchū yíbùfēn qián lái zuò lǚfèi bǔzhù。
不管怎样，要留出一部分钱来做旅费补助。
They granted the second subsidy only on condition that the king himself went abroad to try to bring an end to the war.
Zhǐyǒu guówáng běn rén dào guówài qù yǐ jìnlì jiéshù zhè chǎng zhànzhēng，tāmen cáihuì tígōng dì-èr bǐ bǔzhù。
只有国王本人到国外去以尽力结束这场战争，他们才会提供第二笔补助。
The subsidies debate is a red herring.
Guānyú bǔzhù de zhēnglùn búguò shì zhuǎnyí zhùyìlì de huǎngzi。
关于补助的争论不过是转移注意力的幌子。
You can apply for income support to top up your income.
Nǐ kěyǐ shēnqǐng dīshōurù bǔzhù lái tígāo shōurù suǒdé。
你可以申请低收入补助来提高收入所得。
Supplementary financial aid would come from the state.
Zhèngfǔ jiāng tígōng bǔchōng jīnróng jiùzhù。
政府将提供补充金融救助。
With the help of his friend\'s interpolations his story was eventually told.
Zài tā péngyou búduàn chā bǔ nèiróng de bāngzhù xià，tā de gùshi zuìzhōng déyǐ jiǎng wán。
在他朋友不断插补内容的帮助下，他的故事最终得以讲完。
Any costs recovered will be paid into the legal aid fund.

这种补品中含有人体必需的多种微量元素。
Zhèzhǒng bǔpǐn zhōng hányǒu réntǐ bìxū de duōzhǒng wēiliàng yuánsù。
This tonic contains many micro elements necessary to the human body.
白鳝是一种滋补佳品。
Báishàn shì yìzhǒng zībǔ jiāpǐn。
Eel is very nourishing.
土地经过多年轮种变的贫瘠，需要补充有机质。
Tǔdì jīngguò duōnián lúnzhòng biàn de pínjí，xūyào bǔchōng yǒujīzhì。
After several years of crop rotation, the land became infertile and needed to be supplemented with organic matter.
蜂王浆富含多种营养物质，是食疗滋补的佳品。

Royal jelly is rich in  nutritious substances and is good for one\'s health.
Training is a sort of fuel，not just a bag of tricks that can be applied.

训练是一种补充燃料的方式，但是不能提供所有实际应用中需要的东西。
If you want to mute or darken a colour, you should use the complementary colour.
Rúguǒ nǐ shǐ yánsè róuhé huò àndàn，nǐ yīnggāi cǎiyòng yì zhǒng hùbǔ de yánsè。
如果你使颜色柔和或黯淡，你应该采用一种互补的颜色。
This tonic is guaranteed to give you more pep.

这种滋补品定会给你带来更多活力。
A fine wine is a perfect complement to the dinner.

补充给养
bǔchōngjǐyǎng
replenish the provisions

You are too feeble and should have more nourishment for your body.

Xīn xuèguǎn cóng yǐjīng péngzhàng de xuèguǎn chuáng shàng zhǎng chūlái yǐ míbǔ yíngyǎng quēfá。

The garrison needs us to recruit food supplies.
驻军需要我们补充给养。

这些保健品能为身体补充必需的营养元素。
She had to go to the dentist for an emergency white cement type filling.
Tā bùdébú qù kàn yáyī，jǐnjí tiánchōng báisè niángùfěn bǔyá。
她不得不去看牙医，紧急填充白色粘固粉补牙。
The dentist filled in the cavity.
Yáyī bǔshàngle yáchǐ shàng de dòng。
牙医补上了牙齿上的洞。
When he yawned I could see the gold fillings in his teeth.
Tā dǎ hēqiàn shí wǒ néng kàndào tā bǔ zài yá shàng de jīnzi。
他打呵欠时我能看到他补在牙上的金子。
To be on the safe side, most dentists fill cavities right away.
Wèile ānquán qǐjiàn，dàduōshù yáyī huì mǎshàng bǎ yádòng bǔhǎo。
为了安全起见，大多数牙医会马上把牙洞补好。
猪肝据说能补血。

Pork liver is said to be a blood-builder.
他被车撞了，有点血虚，要补补身体。

阿胶、当归等都能补血。
她付出的心血并未得到补偿。

《Wénxuǎn》 bǔyí 
Supplement to the Wenxuan (a book title)
补选了两名委员。
据《文选》补遗
These two beautiful designs have been chosen to complement the style of the wedding.
Nà liǎng gè měilì de shèjì bèi xuǎnlái bǔzú hūnlǐ de fēnggé。
那两个美丽的设计被选来补足婚礼的风格。
If one of the contestants doesn\'t come I am the alternate.
Rúguǒ yǒu yígè cānsàixuǎnshǒu bù lái，nàme wǒ jiù tìbǔ shàngchǎng。
如果有一个参赛选手不来，那么我就替补上场。
The church members co-opted individuals from similar backgrounds to replenish the congregation.
Jiàopài chéngyuán xuǎnjǔ jùyǒu xiāngsì bèijǐng de rén lái bǔchōng zhège shèng huì。
教派成员选举具有相似背景的人来补充这个圣会。
你知道补习班的起止日期吗？
补习班。
帮助差生补习功课
bāngzhù chàshēng bǔxí gōngkè 
help a slow student with his lessons
给一个因病缺课的学生补习功课
gěi yígè yīn bìng quē kè de xuésheng bǔxí gōngkè
give extra help to a pupil who has missed some classes on account of illness
为了考上理想的学校，小刘每天都到老师家补习文化课。
Wèile kǎoshàng lǐxiǎng de xuéxiào，Xiǎo Liú měitiān dōu dào lǎoshī jiā bǔxí wénhuàkè。
In order to get admitted to a good university, Xiao Liu goes to his teachers\' to make up his cultural lessons.
因为学习成绩差，老师经常给他开设小锅饭，帮他补习功课。
Yīnwéi xuéxí chéngjì chà，lǎoshī jīngcháng gěi tā kāishè xiǎoguōfàn，bāng tā bǔxí gōngkè。
Due to his poor performance, the teacher often coaches him privately to help him catch up.
互相学习，取长补短
hùxiāng xuéxí，qǔchángbǔduǎn
learn from each other to make up deficiencies
学习别人的优点，弥补自己的不足
Xuéxí biéren de yōudiǎn，míbǔ zìjǐ de bùzú。
learn from other people\'s strong points to counteract one\'s own weaknesses
我们应当学习他们的强点来弥补自己的弱点。
Wǒmen yīngdāngxuéxí tāmen de qiángdiǎn lái míbǔ zìjǐ de ruòdiǎn。
We should learn from their strong points to offset our weak ones.
最后的复习阶段，我们重点进行查缺补漏。
Zuìhòu de fùxí jiēduàn，wǒmen zhòngdiǎn jìnxíng cháquē bǔlòu。
At the last stage of our preparation for the test, we will focus on locating and making up for deficiencies.
你知道补习班的起止日期吗？
补习计算机课程
补习班。
A planned tutorial programme was prepared by the senior mistress.
Shèjì hǎo de bǔxí fāng\'àn shì yóu nà wèi gāojí nǚjiàoshī zhìdìng de。
设计好的补习方案是由那位高级女教师制定的。
补体结合试验
bǔtǐ jiéhé shìyàn 
complement fixation test
补身体
bǔshēntǐ 
build up one\'s health (with nourishing food or tonics)
人参是滋补身体的名药。
Rénshēn shì zībǔ shēntǐ de míngyào。
Ginseng is well known for its tonic effect.
他被车撞了，有点血虚，要补补身体。
Tā bèi chē zhuàng le，yǒudiǎn xuèxū，yào bǔbǔ shēntǐ。
He should take more nourishing food, as his blood is deficient due to the car accident.
这种补品中含有人体必需的多种微量元素。
Zhèzhǒng bǔpǐn zhōng hányǒu réntǐ bìxū de duōzhǒng wēiliàng yuánsù。
This tonic contains many micro elements necessary to the human body.
我们的身体需要适量地补充赖氨酸。
Wǒmen de shēntǐ xūyào shìliàng de bǔchōng làiānsuān。
We should supplement with lysine for our health.
你的身体太差了，多吃点营养品补补。
Nǐ de shēntǐ tài chà le，duō chī diǎn yíngyǎngpǐn bǔbǔ。
You are too feeble and should have more nourishment for your body.
他最近身体不太好，就让医生给自己开了一些补剂。
Tā zuìjìn shēntǐ bú tài hǎo，jiù ràng yīshēng gěi zìjǐ kāi le yìxiē bǔjì。
He does not feel well recently, so he asked the doctor to prescribe some tonics.
公司体念你的实际困难，发给你两千元钱做为补助。
Gōngsī tǐniàn nǐ de shíjì kùnnan，fāgěi nǐ liǎng qiān yuán qián zuòwéi bǔzhù。
The company fully understands your financial difficulties, here is 2000 yuan for you.
滋补身体。
白吃了这么多补品，身体还是那么虚弱。
Complement enzymes attack antigens by puncturing the cell membrane.
Bǔtǐméi tōngguò cìchuān xìbāomó lái gōngjī kàngyuán。
补体酶通过刺穿细胞膜来攻击抗原。
The health products implemented the body with necessary nutritious elements.
这些保健品能为身体补充必需的营养元素。
to be on the bench
[体育] 候补
All the modules must fit together and complement each other.
Suǒyǒu mókuài bìxū zǔchéng yí gè zhěngtǐ，xiānghù bǔchōng。
所有模块必须组成一个整体，相互补充。
Fiber recruitment affects oxidative recovery measurements of human muscle.
Guāngxiān bǔchōng yǐngxiǎng yǎnghuà fùyuán jí réntǐ jīròu de cèliáng。
光纤补充影响氧化复原及人体肌肉的测量。
In the organisms we know, replication depends on an accurate fit between the surfaces of complementary molecules.
Wǒmen zhīdào，zài yǒujī wùtǐ zhōng，fùzhì qǔjuéyú hùbǔxìng fēnzǐ biǎocéng zhījiān de jīngquè pǐpèi。
我们知道，在有机物体中，复制取决于互补性分子表层之间的精确匹配。
The Medicaid Buy-In program offers Medicaid coverage to people with disabilities.
医疗补助的买入项目把残疾人也纳入到医保体系中来。
她下学期得补考数学。
Tā xiàxuéqī děi bǔkǎo shùxué。
She has to resit her maths exam next term.
所缺金额，悉数补足。
To be on the safe side, most dentists fill cavities right away.
Wèile ānquán qǐjiàn，dàduōshù yáyī huì mǎshàng bǎ yádòng bǔhǎo。
为了安全起见，大多数牙医会马上把牙洞补好。
He played opposite her.
他扮演她的后补角色
If you want to mute or darken a colour, you should use the complementary colour.
Rúguǒ nǐ shǐ yánsè róuhé huò àndàn，nǐ yīnggāi cǎiyòng yì zhǒng hùbǔ de yánsè。
如果你使颜色柔和或黯淡，你应该采用一种互补的颜色。
The coat had a brown patch covering the elbow.
Zhè jiàn wàitào de zhǒubù yǒu yí kuài zōngsè bǔding。
这件外套的肘部有一块棕色补丁。
Several colored patches were sewn neatly round the seat of his pants.
Jǐ gè cǎisè bǔding bèi zhěngqí de fèng zài tā kùzi dìng bù。
几个彩色补丁被整齐地缝在他裤子腚部。
She had to go to the dentist for an emergency white cement type filling.
Tā bùdébú qù kàn yáyī，jǐnjí tiánchōng báisè niángùfěn bǔyá。
她不得不去看牙医，紧急填充白色粘固粉补牙。
I painted in the rest of the colors.
Wǒ bǔhuà shàng shèngxià de yánsè。
我补画上剩下的颜色。
填补缺额
tiánbǔ quē\'é 
fill a vacancy
考前的一个星期，就是查漏补缺的时间。
Kǎoqián de yígè xīngqī，jiùshì chálòu bǔquē de shíjiān。
A week before the test is the time for locating and making up the deficiencies.
这家公司刚刚贴出招聘启事，就有五个人愿来填补缺员。
Zhèjiā gōngsī gānggāng tiēchū zhāopìn qǐshì，jiù yǒu wǔ gè rén yuànlái tiánbǔ quēyuán。
The company had just put up a wanted advertisement, when five people came who were willing to fill the vacancy.
这部全书尚未完善，还有需要拾遗补缺的地方。
Zhèbù quánshū shàngwèi wánshàn，háiyǒu xūyào shíyí bǔquē de dìfāng。
This book is not complete yet, there is still much to be added.

bǔquē
fill a vacancy
补足缺额
bǔzú quē\'é

At the last stage of our preparation for the test, we will focus on locating and making up for deficiencies.

give extra help to a pupil who has missed some classes on account of illness
这本书填补了词典学方面的重大缺门。
Zhèběnshū tiánbǔ le cídiǎnxué fāngmiàn de zhòngdà quēmén。
This book fills a major gap in lexicography.
售缺的商品我们会尽快补齐，请您耐心等待。
Shòuquē de shāngpǐn wǒmen huì jìnkuài bǔqí，qǐng nín nàixīn děngdài。
We will supply the products that are out of stock as soon as possible, please wait patiently.

调你来就是补副校长这个空缺。
所缺部分，由国家财政补贴。
Her sense of humor has to be a saving grace.
Tā de yōumògǎn bìxū chéngwéi yíxiàng kěyǐ míbǔ quēdiǎn de yōudiǎn。
她的幽默感必须成为一项可以弥补缺点的优点。
I will step into the breach in his absence.
Tā bú zài de shíhou，wǒ huì bǔ tā de quē。
他不在的时候，我会补他的缺。
New blood vessels bud out from the already dilated vascular bed to make up the nutritional deficit.
Xīn xuèguǎn cóng yǐjīng péngzhàng de xuèguǎn chuáng shàng zhǎng chūlái yǐ míbǔ yíngyǎng quēfá。
新血管从已经膨胀的血管床上长出来以弥补营养缺乏。
A person is blind to the extent that he must devise alternative techniques to do efficiently those things he would do with sight if he had normal vision.
Yí gè rén zhǐyǒu zài dàliàng shǐyòng tèshū jìnéng míbǔ shìjué quēxiàn shí，cáinéng bèi shìwéi zhēnzhèng de mángrén。
一个人只有在大量使用特殊技能弥补视觉缺陷时，才能被视为真正的盲人。
a saving grace
可取之处，足以补偿其他缺点的长处
Dead wood should be cut out, allowing adjacent healthy growth to fill the gap.
Kūmù yīngdāng jùdiào，yǐbiàn ràng fùjìn jiànkāng de shùzhī tiánbǔ zhèxiē kòngquē。
枯木应当锯掉，以便让附近健康的树枝填补这些空缺。
We need extra employees for summer fill-ins.
Wǒmen xūyào éwài de gùyuán tiánbǔ xiàjì de kòngquē。
我们需要额外的雇员填补夏季的空缺。
Her speed and determination cancels out all of her other weaknessess.
Tā de sùdù hé juéxīn míbǔle suǒyǒu qítā quēdiǎn。
她的速度和决心弥补了所有其他缺点。
What the country lacks in natural resources it makes up for in bright ideas.
国家在自然资源方面的缺乏由明智的决策加以弥补。
这种补品中含有人体必需的多种微量元素。

滋补食品
zībǔ shípǐn 
nourishing food; nourishment
白鳝是一种滋补佳品。
Báishàn shì yìzhǒng zībǔ jiāpǐn。
Eel is very nourishing.
蜂王浆富含多种营养物质，是食疗滋补的佳品。
Fēngwángjiāng fùhán duōzhǒng yíngyǎng wùzhì，shì shíliáo zībǔ de jiāpǐn。
Royal jelly is rich in  nutritious substances and is good for one\'s health.
你的身体太差了，多吃点营养品补补。

You are too feeble and should have more nourishment for your body.
用些补水的化妆品皮肤就不干涩了。
Yòng xiē bǔshuǐ de huàzhuāngpǐn pífū jiù bùgānsè le。
Your skin will no longer be dry and rough if you apply some hydrating cosmetics.
多吃海产品能够补充大脑消耗，使人变聪明。

教师给学生补课。
Jiàoshī gěi xuéshengbǔkè。
The teacher helped his pupils make up the lesson they had missed.
她经常加班加点为学生补课，但却从不要求学生回报。
Tā jīngcháng jiābān jiādiǎn wèi xuésheng bǔkè，dàn què cóng bú yāoqiú xuésheng huíbào。
She always worked extra hours to make up missed lessons for the students, but never asked for something in return.
这帮孩子暗渡陈仓，说是补课竟然去打游戏了。
Zhè bāng háizi àndùchéncāng，shuōshì bǔkè jìngrán qù dǎ yóuxì le。

补救办法
bǔjiù bànfǎ
remedial measure; remedy
无可补救
wúkěbǔjiù 
be past (or beyond) remedy; irremediable; irreparable
与其补救于已然，不如防患于未然。
Yǔqí bǔjiù yú yǐrán，bùrú fánghuàn yú wèirán。
To forestall is better than to amend. or Prevention is better than cure.
我们必须采取补救措施。
Wǒmen bìxū cǎiqǔ bǔjiùcuòshī。
We must adopt remedial measures.
补救漏洞
想个补救办法。
I know how to right this serious mistake.
我知道该如何补救这个严重的错误。
A sleep deficit may be impossible to make up.
睡眠不足很可能根本无法补救。
Her financial problems are beyond remedy.
她的财政问题是无法补救了。
If someone is accused of sexual harassment a company needs to act swiftly to remedy the situation.
如果有人被控性骚扰，那公司需要迅速行动来做出补救。
This type of problem should have a clear and certain remedy.
Zhè zhǒng lèixíng de wèntí yīnggāi yǒu yí tào qīngxī kěkào de bǔjiù bànfǎ。
这种类型的问题应该有一套清晰可靠的补救办法。
Nothing has been done to right the wrongs of the decade.
Duì shínián de cuòwù méiyǒu cǎiqǔ rènhé bǔjiù cuòshī。
对十年的错误没有采取任何补救措施。
It urged the government to make greater efforts to rectify this situation.
Zhè dūncùzhe zhèngfǔ zuòchū gèngdà nǔlì lái bǔjiù júshì。
这敦促着政府做出更大努力来补救局势。
The only remedy is to go to the hospital.
Wéiyī de bǔjiùbànfǎ jiùshì qù yīyuàn。
唯一的补救办法就是去医院。

他们从修补关系的时期一直发展到整个国家发生实质性变化。
Local government has decided to provide an allowance for family maintenance.
当地政府决定发放家庭生活费补助。
打补丁
dǎ bǔdīng
put (or sew) a patch on; patch up
现在流行在衣服的拐肘处做上补丁。
Xiànzài liúxíng zài yīfu de guǎizhǒu chù zuòshàng bǔdīng。
It is quite popular now to put a patch on the elbows of the sleeves.
在中国，“补丁家庭”日益增多。
Zài Zhōngguó，“ Bǔding jiātíng ” rìyì zēngduō。
There are more and more “patch families”.
衣袖拐肘处有个大补丁。
衣服上有好几个大补丁
在脸盆渗漏处打个补丁。
这块补丁太显眼了。
The sleeve of this shirt is mended.
这件衬衫的袖子上有补丁。
My sock has a mend.
我的袜子上有块儿补丁。
The coat had a brown patch covering the elbow.
Zhè jiàn wàitào de zhǒubù yǒu yí kuài zōngsè bǔding。
这件外套的肘部有一块棕色补丁。
Several colored patches were sewn neatly round the seat of his pants.
Jǐ gè cǎisè bǔding bèi zhěngqí de fèng zài tā kùzi dìng bù。
几个彩色补丁被整齐地缝在他裤子腚部。
His coat had patches over the elbows.
Tā wàitào de liǎng zhǒubù yǒu bǔding。
他外套的两肘部有补丁。
Her stockings had several mends.
Tā de chángwà yǒu jǐ chù bǔding。
她的长袜有几处补丁。
我把用来买电视的钱垫补了房租。
Wǒ bǎ yònglái mǎi diànshì de qián diànbǔ le fángzū。
I used the money I had laid aside for buying a television to pay the house rent.
Perks such as company cars and allowances for newspapers and TV are common.
Éwài bǔtiē——rú gōngsī jiàochē、bàozhǐ hé diànshì bǔzhù děng，shì hěn pǔbiàn de。
额外补贴——如公司轿车、报纸和电视补助等，是很普遍的。
Terry made his Chelsea debut on 28 October 1998 as a third substitute in a League Cup match.
特里在1998年10月28日的联赛杯比赛中作为第三替补球员为切尔西队初次登场比赛。
多吃海产品能够补充大脑消耗，使人变聪明。
Duōchī hǎichǎnpǐn nénggòu bǔchōng dànǎo xiāohào，shǐ rén biàn cōngmíng。
Eating sea products frequently can supplement cerebral consumption, and make people cleverer.
The health products implemented the body with necessary nutritious elements.
这些保健品能为身体补充必需的营养元素。
我们的身体需要适量地补充赖氨酸。
Wǒmen de shēntǐ xūyào shìliàng de bǔchōng làiānsuān。
We should supplement with lysine for our health.
They are packed with food to fuel the young plants\' first stages of their growth.
Tāmen zhuāng mǎn shíwù wéi miáo ér dì-yī jiēduàn de shēngzhǎng bǔchōng néngliàng。
他们装满食物为苗儿第一阶段的生长补充能量。
Fiber recruitment affects oxidative recovery measurements of human muscle.
Guāngxiān bǔchōng yǐngxiǎng yǎnghuà fùyuán jí réntǐ jīròu de cèliáng。
光纤补充影响氧化复原及人体肌肉的测量。

replenish manpower

这时老张插了话，补充了一些新例子。
Zhè shí Lǎo Zhāng chā le huà，bǔchōng le yìxiē xīn lìzi。
At this point Lao Zhang chipped in with some fresh examples.
补充给养
bǔchōngjǐyǎng
replenish the provisions
这个单位将补充自然减员约百人。
Zhège dānwèi jiāngbǔchōngzìrán jiǎnyuán yuē bǎi rén。
About 100 persons will replace those who retire or cannot work for various reasons in this unit.
多吃海产品能够补充大脑消耗，使人变聪明。
Duōchī hǎichǎnpǐn nénggòu bǔchōng dànǎo xiāohào，shǐ rén biàn cōngmíng。
Eating sea products frequently can supplement cerebral consumption, and make people cleverer.
我们两个人的性格互为补充。
Wǒmen liǎnggè rén de xìnggé hùwéi bǔchōng。
Our characters are complimentary.
这篇论文过于空疏了，需要再补充许多东西进去！
Zhèpiān lùnwén guòyú kōngshū le，xūyào zài bǔchōng xǔduō dōngxi jìnqù！
Lacking in substance, this paper needs a lot of things added to it.
多吃空心菜可以补充维生素。
Duō chī kōngxīncài kěyǐ bǔchōng wéishēngsù。
Water spinach can supply vitamins.
我们的身体需要适量地补充赖氨酸。
Wǒmen de shēntǐ xūyào shìliàng de bǔchōng làiānsuān。
We should supplement with lysine for our health.
今年冬天西瓜销售的市况很好，明年我们要有计划地进行补充。
Jīnnián dōngtiān xīguā xiāoshòu de shìkuàng hěnhǎo，míngnián wǒmen yào yǒu jìhuà de jìnxíng bǔchōng。
Watermelons are selling well in the market this winter, so we\'ll supply more next year in a planned way.
这几天在家养气呢，补充精力。
Zhè jǐtiān zàijiā yǎngqì ne，bǔchōng jīnglì。
I have been doing breathing exercises to replenish my energy.
土地经过多年轮种变的贫瘠，需要补充有机质。
Tǔdì jīngguò duōnián lúnzhòng biàn de pínjí，xūyào bǔchōng yǒujīzhì。
After several years of crop rotation, the land became infertile and needed to be supplemented with organic matter.
在孩子长劲儿的时候千万要注意补充营养。
Zài háizi chángjìnr de shíhou qiānwàn yào zhùyì bǔchōng yíngyǎng。
During the periods of rapid childhood growth, parents should provide them with nourishing food.
补充说明
bǔchōngshuōmíng
additional explanation
这篇文章的内容不够充实，需要进一步补写。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng de nèiróng búgòu chōngshí，xūyào jìnyíbùbǔxiě。
This article is not informative enough, and should be expanded to include more details.
补充
说漏的请大家补充
除此之外，我再补充两点意见。
互为补充
文章太单薄，需补充些内容
三营补充了18名新战士。
补充规定
在原定要求外再补充一个训练科目。
再不补充给养，他们要断粮了
急需补充给养。
充当替补。
more can be said
还可以补充一点
remedial reading
补充阅读
to renew provisions
补充食粮
to replenish a stock of goods
补充存货
I hasten to add...
我急忙补充说…

鱼骨粉主要用于做渔业饲料中补充蛋白质的成分。
If you are undermanned, we will staff you up.
如果你们的人手不够，我们会给你们补充人员。
The garrison needs us to recruit food supplies.
驻军需要我们补充给养。
Our replacements will come by noon.
我们补充兵员将在中午前到达。

全副武装的补充兵员将在明天以前到达。
Body builders and athletes take vitamin supplements to help build their muscles.
健身者和运动员补充维生素以锻炼肌肉。

这本参考书可以为课堂教学提供很好的补充。

我们得征募更多的人以补充兵员。

这些保健品能为身体补充必需的营养元素。

Legal controls have been supplemented by financial controls, especially over capital expenditure.

法律控制由金融控制作为补充，尤其是在资金使用方面。

Stolen evidence cannot be used in court but facts learned can be verified.

Tā réngrán zài fúyòng wéitāmìngpiàn zuòwéi yǐnshí de bǔchōng。

Chénggōng de zhèngcè bìxū duì zhèngquè duìdài huánjìng xíngwéi shì gè bǔchōng。

The price of the book may preclude its private purchase, but it would be a useful addition to any library.
Zhè běn shū de jiàgé huòxǔ huì lìng gèrén fàngqì gòumǎi，dàn tā duì rènhé yì jiā túshūguǎn éryán dōushì yǒuyòng de bǔchōng。

Training is a sort of fuel，not just a bag of tricks that can be applied.
Xùnliàn shì yì zhǒng bǔchōng ránliào de fāngshì，dànshì bù néng tígōng suǒyǒu shíjì yìngyòng zhōng xūyào de dōngxi。

资本补贴会导致产能过剩和资本回报率低下。
填补空白
tiánbǔ kòngbái
fill a gap
填补科学技术上的空白
tiánbǔ kēxué jìshù shàng de kòngbái
fill the gaps in science and technology
白鳝是一种滋补佳品。
Báishàn shì yìzhǒng zībǔ jiāpǐn。
Eel is very nourishing.
他们的研究成果填补了科学技术上的一项空白。
Tāmen de yánjiūchéngguǒ tiánbǔle kēxuéjìshù shàng de yíxiàng kòngbái.
The findings of their research filled a scientific and technological gap.
这个小故事可作文艺版的补白。
此案事实虽已清楚，记者尚需补白几句。
填补空白。
白吃了这么多补品，身体还是那么虚弱。
填补了一项高科技的空白。
Fish meal is mainly used as a high-protein supplement in aquaculture feed.
鱼骨粉主要用于做渔业饲料中补充蛋白质的成分。

许多高智商的设计师创造性的填补了许多空白。

她不得不去看牙医，紧急填充白色粘固粉补牙。

Zhè búzúyǐ tiánbǔ xíngfǎlǐ xiànyǒu de kōngbái。
这不足以填补刑法里现有的空白。
补一补，这件衣服仍然可以穿。
Bǔyibǔ，zhèjiàn yīfu réngrán kěyǐ chuān。
You can still wear the clothes if you have them mended.
药补不如食补。
Yàobǔ bùrú shíbǔ。
Nourishing food is better than tonic.
他被车撞了，有点血虚，要补补身体。
Tā bèi chē zhuàng le，yǒudiǎn xuèxū，yào bǔbǔ shēntǐ。
He should take more nourishing food, as his blood is deficient due to the car accident.
你的身体太差了，多吃点营养品补补。
Nǐ de shēntǐ tài chà le，duō chī diǎn yíngyǎngpǐn bǔbǔ。
You are too feeble and should have more nourishment for your body.
药补和食补相结合对她恢复健康有好处。
Yàobǔ hé shíbǔ xiāng jiéhé duì tā huīfù jiànkāng yǒu hǎochù。
A combination of drug therapy and diet will help her recovery.
补衣服
bǔyīfu 
mend (or patch) clothes
补鞋
bǔ xié 
repair (or mend) shoes
补袜子
bǔwàzi 
darn socks
补车胎
bǔchētāi 
mend a puncture
修桥补路
xiūqiáo bǔlù 
build bridges and repair roads
把漏了的字补上
bǎ lòu le de zì bǔshàng
supply the missing words
我们还得补两个人。
Wǒmen hái děi bǔ liǎnggè rén。
We have two vacancies to be filled. or We need two more people.
补身体
bǔshēntǐ 
build up one\'s health (with nourishing food or tonics)
调查结果以后补报。
Diàochá jiéguǒ yǐhòu bǔbào。
Findings will be reported later.

《Xiàndài hànyǔ cídiǎn bǔbiān》
Supplement to A Dictionary of the Modern Chinese Language

bǔcháng suǒ shòu de sǔnshī

bǔchángchā\'é

打补丁
dǎ bǔdīng
put (or sew) a patch on; patch up
材料丢失，不予补发。
Cáiliào diūshī bùyǔ bǔfā。
The material will not be reissued if lost.
补发增加的工资
bǔfā zēngjiā de gōngzī
pay increased wages retroactively
补救办法
bǔjiù bànfǎ
remedial measure; remedy
无可补救
wúkěbǔjiù 
be past (or beyond) remedy; irremediable; irreparable
教师给学生补课。
Jiàoshī gěi xuéshengbǔkè。
The teacher helped his pupils make up the lesson they had missed.
同事之间，要相互补台，不要拆台。
Tóngshì zhī jiān，yào xiānghù bǔtái，búyào chāitái。
Colleagues should support, not sabotage, each other.
补体结合试验
bǔtǐ jiéhé shìyàn 
complement fixation test
由国家给予补贴
yóu guójiā jǐyǔ bǔtiē

粮食补贴

shēnɡhuó bǔtiē

补选人民代表
bǔxuǎn rénmín dàibiǎo

猪肝据说能补血。
Zhūgān jùshuō néngbǔxiě。
Pork liver is said to be a blood-builder.
营养补液
yínɡyǎnɡ bǔyè 
nutritious drink; tonic
《文选》补遗

Supplement to the Wenxuan (a book title)
有所补益
yǒusuǒbǔyì

实物补助
shíwù bǔzhù

煤火补助
méihuǒ bǔzhù

缝连补缀
fénglián bǔzhuì

补缀成文
bǔzhuìchénɡwén

补足缺额
bǔzú quē\'é

补足差额
bǔzú chā\'é

这时老张插了话，补充了一些新例子。
Zhè shí Lǎo Zhāng chā le huà，bǔchōng le yìxiē xīn lìzi。
At this point Lao Zhang chipped in with some fresh examples.
帮助差生补习功课
bāngzhù chàshēng bǔxí gōngkè 
help a slow student with his lessons
取人之长，补己之短
Qǔrénzhīcháng，bǔjǐzhīduǎn。
overcome one\'s shortcomings by learning from others\' strong points
弥补赤字
míbǔ chìzì 
make up (or meet) a deficit
这样做不但于事无补，反会把事情弄糟。
Zhèyàng zuò búdàn yúshìwúbǔ，fǎn huì bǎ shìqing nòngzāo。
This won\'t do any good; on the contrary, it will make things even worse.
风险补偿
fēngxiǎn bǔcháng

缝补衣服

ZhōnggòngZhōngyāngZhèngzhìjú hòubǔ wěiyuán

hùbǔxìnɡ

我们两国的经济是互补的。
Wǒmen liǎngguó de jīngjì shì hùbǔ de。
Our two countries are mutually complementary in economy.
伙食补助
huǒshí bǔzhù
food allowance
这堵墙已几经倒塌，几经修补。
Zhè dǔ qiángyǐ jǐjīngdǎotā，jǐjīngxiūbǔ。
The wall has collapsed and been rebuilt several times.
补充给养
bǔchōngjǐyǎng

Gǒuqǐ shì zībǔ jiāpǐn。

贴补家用
tiēbǔ jiāyòng

冬令进补
dōnglìngjìnbǔ

空额已经补上了。
Kòng\'é yǐjing bǔshàng le。
The vacancy has already been filled.
主任的空缺谁来补？
Zhǔrèn de kòngquē shéi lái bǔ?

弥补亏空
míbǔ kuīkōng

申请困补
shēnqǐnɡ kùn bǔ

无法弥补的损失
wúfǎ míbǔ de sǔnshī

学习别人的优点，弥补自己的不足
Xuéxí biéren de yōudiǎn，míbǔ zìjǐ de bùzú。
learn from other people\'s strong points to counteract one\'s own weaknesses
以丰补歉
yǐfēnɡbǔqiàn 
make up for a crop failure with a bumper harvest
我们应当学习他们的强点来弥补自己的弱点。
Wǒmen yīngdāngxuéxí tāmen de qiángdiǎn lái míbǔ zìjǐ de ruòdiǎn。
We should learn from their strong points to offset our weak ones.
互相学习，取长补短
hùxiāng xuéxí，qǔchángbǔduǎn

给一个因病缺课的学生补习功课
gěi yígè yīn bìng quē kè de xuésheng bǔxí gōngkè

这本书填补了词典学方面的重大缺门。
Zhèběnshū tiánbǔ le cídiǎnxué fāngmiàn de zhòngdà quēmén。
This book fills a major gap in lexicography.

tìbǔ duìyuán

填补亏空
tiánbǔ kuīkōng

还有存的料子贴补着用，现在先不买。
Hái yǒu cún de liàozi tiēbǔ zhe yòng，xiànzài xiān bùmǎi。
Make do with the piece of cloth we\'ve got on hand. You don\'t have to buy something new.
亡羊补牢，犹未为晚。
Wángyángbǔláo，yóuwèiwéiwǎn。
It is not too late to mend the fold even after the sheep is lost.
空谈无补于实际。
Kōngtán wúbǔ yú shíjì。
Mere words won\'t help matters.
市政府强调指出，这次下拨的补贴款必须专款专用。
Shì zhèngfǔ qiángdiào zhǐchū，zhècì xiàbō de bǔtiēkuǎn bìxū zhuānkuǎnzhuānyòng。
The Municipal Government stressed that the subsidies allocated must be used for their specified purposes only.

To forestall is better than to amend. or Prevention is better than cure.
以资弥补
yǐ zī míbǔ 
to make up the deficit; to make up a shortage
操之过急，于事无补。
Cāozhīguòjí，yúshìwúbǔ。
It would be of no avail to act with undue haste.
该书内容有所增补。
Gāi shū nèiróngyǒu suǒ zēngbǔ。
The book has been supplemented with new material.
请点一下，不够再找补。
Qǐnɡ diǎn yíxià, búɡòu zài zhǎobu。 
Count it, please. We\'ll make it up if there\'s any shortage.
这儿没焊好，再找补两下。
Zhèr méi hànhǎo，zài zhǎobu liǎngxià。
The welding is faulty here. Let\'s touch it up.
政策性补贴
zhènɡcèxìnɡ bǔtiē

bùkě zhuībǔ de sǔnshī

酌予补助
zhuó yǔ bǔzhù 
give some financial assistance
滋补食品
zībǔ shípǐn 
nourishing food; nourishment
人参是滋补身体的名药。
Rénshēn shì zībǔ shēntǐ de míngyào。
Ginseng is well known for its tonic effect.
凡属经营性亏损的，国家不再补亏。
Fánshǔ jīngyíngxìng kuīsǔn de，guójiā búzài bǔkuī。
All losses arising from management will no longer be subsidized by the state.
王军替补上场后，梅开二度，又进一球。
Wáng Jūn tìbǔ shàngchǎng hòu，méikāi èrdù，yòu jìn yì qiú。
生活困难，按例可以申请补助。
Shēnghuó kùnnan，ànlì kěyǐ shēnqǐng bǔzhù。
The needy usually may ask for relief.
过去奶奶常在暗弱的烛光下缝补全家的衣服。
Guòqù nǎinai cháng zài ànruò de zhúguāng xià féngbǔ quánjiā de yīfu。
Grandma used to mend clothes for the whole family under dim candle light.
白鳝是一种滋补佳品。
Báishàn shì yìzhǒng zībǔ jiāpǐn。
Eel is very nourishing.
他经常拿自己的工资帮补生活困难的学生。
Tā jīngcháng ná zìjǐ de gōngzī bāngbǔ shēnghuó kùnnan de xuésheng。
He always uses his salary to help students in need.
他是球队的备补队员。
Tā shì qiúduì de bèibǔ duìyuán。
He is a substitute player of the team.
博览群书，可裨补阙漏。
Bólǎn qúnshū，kě bìbǔ quēlòu。
One can greatly benefit by reading extensively.
此项措施对改进工作大有裨补。
Cǐ xiàng cuòshī duì gǎijìn gōngzuò dàyǒu bìbǔ。
This measure is of great benefit to the improvement of the job.
他丢了学生证，只好申请处补办。
Tā diū le xuéshengzhèng，zhǐhǎo shēnqǐngchù bǔbàn。
He lost his student card, and had to re-register to get another.
跨国公司的多元化经营有利于进行补偿贸易。
Kuàguó gōngsī de duōyuánhuà jīngyíng yǒulìyú jìnxíng bǔcháng màoyì。
The diversified management of the international companies enjoys the benefits of compensation trade.
我们应当加强防卫，避免后勤补给线遭到破坏。
Wǒmen yīngdāng jiāqiáng fángwè，bìmiǎn hòuqín bǔjǐxiàn zāodào pòhuài。
We should strengthen our defense to protect the safety of the supply line.
他看书时很重视后面的补记。
Tā kànshū shí hěnzhòngshì hòumiàn de bǔjì。
When reading he attaches great importance to the epilogue of books.
他最近身体不太好，就让医生给自己开了一些补剂。
Tā zuìjìn shēntǐ bú tài hǎo，jiù ràng yīshēng gěi zìjǐ kāi le yìxiē bǔjì。
He does not feel well recently, so he asked the doctor to prescribe some tonics.
你们班的作业不全，再补交一次。
Nǐmen bān de zuòyè bùquán，zài bǔjiāo yícì。
Those who did not hand in the assignment should make it up at a later date.
他朋友从药店为他买来了补酒。
Tā péngyou cóng yàodiàn wèi tā mǎilái le bǔjiǔ。
His friend bought him some tonic alcohol at the drugstore.
他提出了各项补苴罅漏的措施，却迟迟得不到贯彻。
Tā tíchū le gè xiàng bǔjūxiàlòu de cuòshī，què chíchí débúdào guànchè。
The remedy measures he proposed were not carried out yet.
最后的复习阶段，我们重点进行查缺补漏。
Zuìhòu de fùxí jiēduàn，wǒmen zhòngdiǎn jìnxíng cháquē bǔlòu。
At the last stage of our preparation for the test, we will focus on locating and making up for deficiencies.
考前的一个星期，就是查漏补缺的时间。
Kǎoqián de yígè xīngqī，jiùshì chálòu bǔquē de shíjiān。
A week before the test is the time for locating and making up the deficiencies.
这篇文章的内容不够充实，需要进一步补写。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng de nèiróng búgòu chōngshí，xūyào jìnyíbùbǔxiě。
This article is not informative enough, and should be expanded to include more details.
交给老师之前，他又将申请书补正了一遍。
Jiāogěi lǎoshī zhīqián，tā yòu jiāng shēnqǐngshū bǔzhèng le yí biàn。
Before handing in his application to his teacher, he proofread it again.
他最近手头拮据，只能拆东墙补西墙。
Tā zuìjìn shǒutóu jiéjù，zhǐnéng chāi dōngqiáng bǔ xīqiáng。
Short of money recently, he could only rob Peter to pay Paul.
我都这么大了，怎么还好意思靠家里搭补过日子。
Wǒ dōu zhème dà le，zěnme hái hǎoyìsi kào jiā lǐ dābǔ guò rìzi。
Being so old, how can I still live on the financial support of my family?
用这笔代金来补偿你们的损失吧。
Yòng zhè bǐ dàijīn lái bǔcháng nǐmen de sǔnshī ba。
We will compensate you for your damages with this allowance.
由于连年亏损，公司只能靠出卖土地抵补债务了。
Yóuyú liánnián kuīsǔn，gōngsī zhǐnéng kào chūmài tǔdì dǐbǔ zhàiwù le。
The company had to sell its land to pay off debts due to losses in successive years.
如果你饿了，就先点补一下吧。
Rúguǒ nǐ è le，jiù xiān diǎnbǔ yíxià ba。
Eat some food before the meal if you are hungry.
我把用来买电视的钱垫补了房租。
Wǒ bǎ yònglái mǎi diànshì de qián diànbǔ le fángzū。
I used the money I had laid aside for buying a television to pay the house rent.
饭前，他垫补了两块面包。
Fàn qián，tā diànbǔ le liǎng kuài miànbāo。
He ate two loaves of bread before the meal.
小刘把单位发的房补都攒起来了。
Xiǎo Liú bǎ dānwèi fā de fángbǔ dōu zǎn qǐlái le。
Xiao Liu saved all the housing allowance allocated by his company.
适量蜂花粉与蜂蜜调合，每天饮用一些，既滋补又美容。
Shìliàng fēnghuāfěn yǔ fēngmì tiáohé，měitiān yǐnyòng yìxiē，jì zībǔ yòu měiróng。
Drinking some bee pollen mixed with honey every day is good for your health and can make you more attractive.
蜂王浆富含多种营养物质，是食疗滋补的佳品。
Fēngwángjiāng fùhán duōzhǒng yíngyǎng wùzhì，shì shíliáo zībǔ de jiāpǐn。
Royal jelly is rich in  nutritious substances and is good for one\'s health.
吃钙片不是补钙的唯一途径。
Chī gàipiàn búshì bǔgài de wéiyī tújìng。
Taking calcium tablets is not the only way to supply calcium.
补钙不当同样会导致钙质流失。
Bǔgài búdàng tóngyàng huì dǎozhì gàizhì liúshī。
Inappropriate calcium supplements also lead to calcium excretion.
用些补水的化妆品皮肤就不干涩了。
Yòng xiē bǔshuǐ de huàzhuāngpǐn pífū jiù bùgānsè le。
Your skin will no longer be dry and rough if you apply some hydrating cosmetics.
这些弹药都是供应舰补给的。
Zhèxiē dànyào dōushì gōngyìngjiàn bǔjǐ de。
These ammunitions are all furnished by the supply vessel.
现在流行在衣服的拐肘处做上补丁。
Xiànzài liúxíng zài yīfu de guǎizhǒu chù zuòshàng bǔdīng。
It is quite popular now to put a patch on the elbows of the sleeves.
多吃海产品能够补充大脑消耗，使人变聪明。
Duōchī hǎichǎnpǐn nénggòu bǔchōng dànǎo xiāohào，shǐ rén biàn cōngmíng。
Eating sea products frequently can supplement cerebral consumption, and make people cleverer.
听说核桃仁儿可以补脑，你应该多吃点。
Tīngshuō hétáorénr kěyǐ bǔnǎo，nǐ yīnggāi duō chī diǎn。
It is said that the walnut kernel can nourish the brain, so you should eat  a lot of them.
这支红参是给他补身子用的，很昂贵呢。
Zhèzhī hóngsēn shì gěi tā bǔshēnzi yòng de，hěnángguì ne。
The ginseng is used to recover his health. It is very expensive.
我们两个人的性格互为补充。
Wǒmen liǎnggè rén de xìnggé hùwéi bǔchōng。
Our characters are complimentary.
她经常加班加点为学生补课，但却从不要求学生回报。
Tā jīngcháng jiābān jiādiǎn wèi xuésheng bǔkè，dàn què cóng bú yāoqiú xuésheng huíbào。
She always worked extra hours to make up missed lessons for the students, but never asked for something in return.
警察抓他时他非常后悔，但已是江心补漏，为时已晚。
Jǐngchá zhuā tā shí tā fēicháng hòuhuǐ，dàn yǐshì jiāngxīn bǔlòu，wéishí yǐwǎn。
He felt deeply regretful when he was arrested by the police, but it was too late for him to mend his ways.
这次任务他格外卖力，想将功折罪以弥补上次的失败。
Zhècì rènwù tā géwài màilì，xiǎng jiānggōng zhézuì yǐ míbǔ shàngcì de shībài。
This time he is going to do his utmost to make amends for the failure last time.
您通过阅读这本《〈全唐诗〉校补》可以全面了解中国的诗文化。
Nín tōngguò yuèdú zhè běn《〈Quántángshī〉jiàobǔ》kěyǐ quánmiàn liǎojiě Zhōngguó de shī wénhuà。
You can get a full understanding of Chinese poems by reading The Poems of Tang Dynasty, Collated and Supplemented.
这篇论文过于空疏了，需要再补充许多东西进去！
Zhèpiān lùnwén guòyú kōngshū le，xūyào zài bǔchōng xǔduō dōngxi jìnqù！
Lacking in substance, this paper needs a lot of things added to it.
多吃空心菜可以补充维生素。
Duō chī kōngxīncài kěyǐ bǔchōng wéishēngsù。
Water spinach can supply vitamins.
店里的苹果已经亏短了，需要补货！
Diàn lǐ de píngguǒ yǐjing kuīduǎn le，xūyào bǔhuò！
The apples in the store are insufficient so we need to purchase more.
对于我给他造成的伤害我非常愧悔，我会想办法补偿的。
Duìyú wǒ gěi tā zàochéng de shānghài wǒ fēicháng kuìhuǐ，wǒ huì xiǎng bànfǎ bǔcháng de。
I am ashamed by and regretful over his damage, and I will think of a way to compensate him.
我们的身体需要适量地补充赖氨酸。
Wǒmen de shēntǐ xūyào shìliàng de bǔchōng làiānsuān。
We should supplement with lysine for our health.
我们应该补修一下这条公路的路肩了。
Wǒmen yīnggāi bǔxiū yíxià zhètiáo gōnglù de lùjiān le。
We should repair the road shoulders of the highway.
单位里除工资外每个月都多发200元餐补费，这就是明贴。
Dānwèi lǐ chú gōngzī wài měigè yuè dōu duōfā èrbǎiyuán cānbǔfèi，zhè jiùshì míngtiē。
Except for salary, the work unit pays employees a 200 yuan meal subsidy, which is an open subsidy.
小明考试不及格，没奈何，只好补考。
Xiǎo Míng kǎoshì bùjígé，méi nàihé，zhǐhǎo bǔkǎo。
Xiaoming failed the examination. Since there is no alternative, he had to take a make-up exam.
重新拼缀修补过的感情，毕竟还是有裂痕的。
Chóngxīn pīnzhuì xiūbǔ guò de gǎnqíng，bìjìng háishi yǒu lièhén de。
Their pieced and patched emotions still have problems after all.
这家公司刚刚贴出招聘启事，就有五个人愿来填补缺员。
Zhèjiā gōngsī gānggāng tiēchū zhāopìn qǐshì，jiù yǒu wǔ gè rén yuànlái tiánbǔ quēyuán。
The company had just put up a wanted advertisement, when five people came who were willing to fill the vacancy.

Wǒmen yào bǐng zhe xiūjiù rújiù de yuánzé lái xiūbǔ gǔjí shànběn。

Watermelons are selling well in the market this winter, so we\'ll supply more next year in a planned way.

I\'ll give a brief account of how things are in this place.
简要的介绍
jiǎnyào de jièshào 
a brief introduction; briefing
作自我介绍
zuò zìwǒ jièshào
introduce oneself
介绍对象
jièshào duìxiànɡ
introduce sb. to a potential marriage partner; find sb. a boy or girl friend
介绍情况
jièshào qínɡkuànɡ
brief sb. on the situation; put sb. in the picture; fill sb. in
介绍经验
jièshào jīngyàn
pass on experience
开介绍信
kāi jièshàoxìn
write a letter of introduction
许多牌例都已介绍过了。
Xǔduō páilì dōu yǐ jièshàoguò le。
Many different plays have already been described.
没时间一一介绍
méi shíjiān yīyī jièshào 
have no time to go into details or cover everything
打介绍信
dǎ jièshàoxìn
write a letter of introduction (for sb.); get a letter of introduction (from one\'s organization)
我给你介绍一本书。
Wǒ gěi nǐ jièshào yìběn shū。
I\'ll recommend you a book.

华莱士爵士曾是伦敦法庭里18位法官中的核心人物。

一周六天上课时间中共有五节核心学术课。
The party machine has been very busy with the elections.
该党派的核心人物最近正忙于竞选事宜。
He hasn\'t touched on the central argument yet.
他还没有谈到核心议题。

在核心原则上的巨大分歧导致了这个党派的分裂。
Teachers are the center of the education system.
Lǎoshī，shì jiàoyù xìtǒng de héxīn。
老师，是教育系统的核心。

这些课程组成了医学课程要求的核心部分。
The core of the problem is a lack of funding.
Wèntí de héxīn zàiyú quēfá zījīn。
问题的核心在于缺乏资金。

Měi gè héxīn cúnchǔ yí wèi shùjù，bìng bèi jiā zài diànlùbǎn zhījiān。
每个核心存储一位数据，并被夹在电路板之间。
The current produces a flux in the core of the transformer.
Diànliú zài biànyāqì de héxīn zhìzào chū liúdòng。
电流在变压器的核心制造出流动。
When the core temperature of the star reaches 1.3 billion degrees neon reacts to form oxygen.
Dāng héngxīng de héxīn wēndù dádào shísān yì shèshìdù de shíhou，nǎi jiù huì tōngguò huàxuéfǎnyìng biànchéng yǎng。
当恒星的核心温度达到13亿摄氏度的时候，氖就会通过化学反应变成氧。
He had a large inner loop that he trusted with everything.
Tā yǒu yí gè tā wánquán xìnrèn de dàxíng héxīn gùwèntuán。
他有一个他完全信任的大型核心顾问团。
Magnificently built churches are still the nucleus of parochial work.

He has made much of the core technology.
Tā chōngfèn lǐjiěle héxīnjìshù。
他充分理解了核心技术。
Businesses in a central location are, more often than not, short of labour.

Our core members will be replaced with a new team.

原子核物理学
yuánzǐhé wùlǐxué 
nuclear physics
我对原子核物理学一窍不通。
Wǒ duì yuánzihé wùlǐxué yíqiàobùtōng。
I\'m out of my depth when it comes to nuclear physics.
At that time nuclear physics had no practical applications.
Zài nàge niándài，yuánzǐhé wùlǐxué shàngwèi shíjì yìngyòng。
在那个年代，原子核物理学尚未实际应用。
我们搞一点核武器完全是为了自卫。
Wǒmen gǎo yìdiǎn héwǔqì wánquán shì wèi le zìwèi。
It is purely for self-defence that we have produced some nuclear weapons.

héwǔqì chǔbèi
stockpiling of nuclear weapons; nuclear weapons stockpile

xiāohuǐ héwǔqì
have the nuclear weapons destroyed
拥有核武器
yōngyǒu héwǔqì 
possess nuclear weapons
战术核武器
zhànshù héwǔqì 
tactical nuclear weapons
热核武器拥有惊人的杀伤力。
Rèhé wǔqì yōngyǒu jīngrén de shāshānglì。
Thermonuclear weapons have high destructive power.
核潜艇是一种战略武器。
Héqiántǐng shì yìzhǒng zhànlüè wǔqì。
The Nuclear submarine is a kind of strategic weapon.
核武器
我国政府严正声明，我们任何时候都不会首先使用核武器。
Conventional warfare is conducted by using conventional military weapons instead of nuclear weapons.
常规战争使用的是用常规武器而不是核武器。
Nuclear disarmament and nonproliferation are closely related goals.
Cáijiǎn héwǔqì hé fángzhǐ hékuòsàn shì mìqiè-xiāngguān de liǎng gè mùbiāo。
裁减核武器和防止核扩散是密切相关的两个目标。
nuclear weapons
核武器
Completely banning nuclear weapons is a virtual impossibility.
完全禁止核武器实际上是不可能的。
We will help Russia in her efforts to dismantle nuclear weapons.

我们要帮助俄罗斯废除核武器。

该导弹携带了一个核武器。

领导人提议并同意停止核武器的研究和使用。
Personally I would like to see us get shot of all nuclear weapons.

我个人希望看到我们能摆脱所有的核武器。

Suízhe héwǔqì búduàn kuòsàn，zǔzhǐ zhànzhēng yuèláiyuè jǐnpò le。
随着核武器不断扩散，阻止战争越来越紧迫了。
We must not proliferate nuclear arms.
Wǒmen juébùnéng kuòsàn héwǔqì。
我们决不能扩散核武器。
Russia and the united states discussed the dismantling of their nuclear weapons.

hésuàn shēngchǎn chéngběn
work out the costs of production
基本核算单位
jīběn hésuàn dānwèi
basic accounting unit

dúlì hésuàn dānwèi
independent accounting unit
经济核算单位
jīngjì hésuàn dānwèi
business accounting unit
经过成本核算，他的饭店今年赚钱不多。

His restaurant recorded little profit this year, after accounting for his expenses.

It is not easy to calculate one\'s hourly wage.
成本核算时有形损耗往往不会被忽略。

经过成本核算，他的饭店今年赚钱不多。

他俩都年轻气盛，几句话不和就打了起来。

他对人宽宏大量，小事情从不和我们计较。

你过于宽让了，别人就会欺负你！
Nǐ guòyú kuān ràng le，biérén jiùhuì qīfù nǐ！
If you are too lenient, you will be bullied by others.
他天性宽仁，想让他害人都难呀！
Tā tiānxìng kuānrén，xiǎng ràng tā hàirén dōu nán ya！
He is too lenient. It is impossible for him to harm people.
皇帝登基时，宽赦了一些囚犯。
Huángdì dēngjī shí，kuānshè le yìxiē qiúfàn。
When the emperor ascended the throne, he pardoned many criminals.
望着那广阔的海面，心情自然宽舒许多！
Wàng zhe nà guǎngkuò de hǎimiàn，xīnqíng zìrán kuānshū xǔduō！
The broad and limitless sea will surely set your mind at ease.
新家很大，采光也好，比以前那老房子宽舒多了。
Xīnjiā hěndà，cǎiguāng yě hǎo，bǐ yǐqián nà lǎofángzi kuānshū duō le。
The new house, large and bright, is more spacious than the old one.
医生给我吃了宽心丸，告诉我不用担心孩子的病情。
Yīshēng gěi wǒ chī le kuānxīnwán，gàosù wǒ búyòng dānxīn háizi de bìngqíng。
The doctor said some comforting words to me and told me not to worry about the child\'s illness.
你只有宽以待人，别人才会对你好！
Nǐ zhǐyǒu kuānyǐ dàirén，biérén cái huì duì nǐ hǎo！
People will be friendly to you only if you are easy on them.
这部科幻电影是适合于宽银幕播放的。
Zhèbù kēhuàn diànyǐng shì shìhéyú kuānyínmù bōfàng de。
This science fiction film lends itself well to wide screen.
我不是故意的，请你宽宥。
Wǒ búshì gùyì de，qǐng nǐ kuānyòu。
Please forgive me. I didn\'t intent to do that.
年底了，我手头的钱也不宽余，就等着发工资呢。
Niándǐ le，wǒ shǒutóu de qián yě bùkuānyú，jiù děng zhe fā gōngzī ne。
Since it is near the end of the year, I am not in easy circumstances and am waiting for my salary.
放假后，就可以宽余几天了！
Fàngjià hòu，jiù kěyǐ kuānyú jǐtiān le！
I\'ll have leisure time when the vacation comes.
我也不富裕，你还是去家境宽展的老李那儿借钱吧。
Wǒ yě bú fùyù，nǐ háishi qù jiājìng kuānzhǎn de Lǎo Lǐ nàr jiè qián ba。
I am not well-off either. You\'d better borrow money from Laoli, who is comfortably off.
要是一个劲地宽展下去，到什么时候才能办好手续呀。
Yàoshì yígèjìn de kuānzhǎn xiàqù，dào shénme shíhou cáinéng bànhǎo shǒuxù ya。
How can the formality be settled if it keeps being put off?
你对他太宽纵了，所以他现在才会这样无法无天！
Nǐ duì tā tài kuānzòng le，suǒyǐ tā xiànzài cái huì zhèyàng wúfǎ wútiān！
You were too indulgent with him, so now he stops at nothing.
这些溃兵，我们抓到以后要宽大处理。
Zhèxiē kuìbīng，wǒmen zhuādào yǐhòu yào kuāndà chǔlǐ。
After catching those defeated and dispersed soldiers, we should treat them with mercy.
一个男人家，应该宽容大度些！
Yígè nánrénjia，yīnggāi kuānróng dàdù xiē！
As a man, you should be tolerant and magnanimous.
放下你们手中的枪杆子，我们会申请对你们宽大处理的。
Fàngxià nǐmen shǒu zhōng de qiānggǎnzi，wǒmen huì shēnqǐng duì nǐmen kuāndà chǔlǐ de。
Put down your arms, and we will apply for lenient treatment for you.
你应该努力拓宽自己的社交圈。
Nǐ yīnggāi nǔlì tuòkuān zìjǐ de shèjiāoquān。

The government has created a favorable environment for investment, and has even agreed to reduce or exempt tax.
房东来收租时，体谅到我的难处，给我宽限了几天。

他心宽手大，从不把钱放在心上。
Tā xīnkuān shǒudà，cóng bùbǎ qián fàngzài xīnshàng。
He spends money freely, never taking it seriously.

Tǎnbái cóngkuān、kàngjù cóngyán shì wǒmen de yíguàn zhèngcè。
It is our consistent policy to give leniency to those who confess their crimes and severity to those who refuse to do so.
国王对他的错误网开三面，决定从宽发落。
Guówáng duì tā de cuòwù wǎngkāi sān miàn，juédìng cóngkuān fāluò。
The king was very lenient towards his error, and decided to give him the lightest punishment.
我们要学会宽容，不能对别人进行挟嫌报复。

We must learn to be generous and not harbor resentment against others.

Jack is a broad-minded person who never argues with his friends over trivial things.

我最近减肥，衣带都宽了好多。

a violent storm

昨天的暴风雨是很猛烈，但至少让空气很清新，你不这么认为吗？

本周末将有一场猛烈的飓风袭来。

use too much strength; overexert oneself

propose the calling of an international conference

As a general manager, he has too many things to worry about.
他总是望子成龙，却没有考虑到孩子们的感受。

He longs to see his children succeed in life, but he neglects their feelings.
老王愁虑的是明年三个孩子的学费怎么办。
Lǎo Wáng chóulǜ de shì míngnián sāngè háizi de xuéfèi zěnmebàn。
Lao Wang is worried about how he will get school tuition for his three children next year.
对他的辞讼请求，我们会认真考虑的。
Duì tā de císòng qǐngqiú，wǒmen huì rènzhēn kǎolǜ de。
We will seriously consider his resignation request.
他只知道打小算盘，从来都不考虑大家的利益。
Tā zhǐ zhīdào dǎ xiǎosuànpan，cónglái dōu bùkǎolǜ dàjiā de lìyì。
He is calculating, and never shows consideration for the interests of others.
我们不能只搞短期行为，应该有更为长远的考虑。
Wǒmen bùnéng zhǐ gǎo duǎnqī xíngwéi，yīnggāi yǒu gèng wéi chángyuǎn de kǎolǜ。
We should not just set our eyes on short-term interests, but should instead be far-sighted.
一切都会好起来的，你别太多虑了。
Yíqiè dōuhuì hǎo qǐlai de，nǐ bié tài duōlǜ le。
Everything will be fine. Don\'t worry too much.
虽然方方面面不能都考虑到，但也要力求做事严谨。
Suīrán fāngfāng miànmiàn bùnéng dōu kǎolǜ dào，dàn yěyào lìqiú zuòshì yánjǐn。
Although it is impossible to cover every aspect, we must strive for preciseness as much as we can.
他总是当时不考虑清楚，过去几天了才找后帐。
Tā zǒngshì dāngshí bùkǎolǜ qīngchu，guòqù jǐtiān le cái zhǎo hòuzhàng。
He never thinks things through when they happen, but blames others later.
请从现实考虑，不要做黄粱梦。
Qǐng cóng xiànshí kǎolǜ，búyào zuò huángliángmèng。
Please consider this realisticly, don\'t dream of something impossible.
我们去少数民族朋友家里时一定要考虑到他们的讳忌，以免闹出不愉快的事。
Wǒmen qù shǎoshù mínzú péngyou jiā lǐ shí yídìng yào kǎolǜ dào tāmen de huìjì，yǐmiǎn nàochū bùyúkuài de shì。
When we are visiting ethnic minority families, we must bear in mind their social taboos so as not to cause any displeasure.
他对这事还有疑虑，我们为他解疑吧。
Tā duì zhè shì háiyǒu yílǜ，wǒmen wèi tā jiěyí ba。
Let\'s relieve him of his doubts in regard to this matter.
冷寂的长夜使我不禁想起了少年之时伙伴们无忧无虑地打闹玩耍的场景。
Lěngjì de chángyè shǐ wǒ bùjīn xiǎngqǐ le shàonián zhī shí huǒbànmen wúyōu wúlǜ de dǎnào wánshuǎ de chǎngjǐng。
The still and lonely long night reminds me of the scenes when I  played happily and carefreely with my friends in the days of my youth.
事物都是有两重性的，要分清主次，也必须考虑全面。
Shìwù dōushì yǒu liǎngchóngxìng de，yào fēnqīng zhǔcì，yě bìxū kǎolǜ quánmiàn。
All things have two sides. We must distinguish the primary and secondary. We should also consider it in full-scale.
我一直渴望能够到达一个无忧无虑的露地。
Wǒ yìzhí kěwàng nénggòu dàodá yígè wúyōu wúlǜ de lùdì。
I have a longing for a place where I will not have any worries or cares.
他思虑绵密，一定能胜任这项工作。
Tā sīlǜ miánmì，yídìng néng shèngrèn zhè xiàng gōngzuò。
He is meticulous, so he must be adequate to this task.
对于这个岛的命名，我们认真考虑了名从主人的原则。
Duìyú zhège dǎo de mìngmíng，wǒmen rènzhēn kǎolǜ le míngcóng zhǔrén de yuánzé。
We have seriously taken into consideration the principle of giving a name after its master in naming this island.
请著名影后出演化妆品广告，就是出于名人效应的考虑啊！
Qǐng zhùmíng yǐnghòu chūyǎn huàzhuāngpǐn guǎnggào，jiùshì chūyú míngrén xiàoyìng de kǎolǜ a！
It is out of celebrity effect consideration to invite the famous movie queen to act in the cosmetics advertisement.
出于健康的考虑，他采用了环保的墙面漆。
Chūyú jiànkāng de kǎolǜ，tā cǎiyòng le huánbǎo de qiángmiànqī。
In view of health, he adopted the environmentally friendly wall lacquer.
考虑到晴雨伞的实用性，我也买了一把。
Kǎolǜdào qíngyǔsǎn de shíyòngxìng，wǒ yě mǎi le yì bǎ。
In view of the practicality of an umbrella for protection from sun and rain, I bought one too.
这家公司的薪酬不错，去就问题你要多考虑。
Zhèjiā gōngsī de xīnchóu búcuò，qù jiù wèntí nǐ yào duō kǎolǜ。
The company offers a high salary, you should really consider whether to take the post or not.
你作为公司的领导，做事总要考虑全局性影响啊。
Nǐ zuòwéi gōngsī de lǐngdǎo，zuòshì zǒngyào kǎolǜ quánjúxìng yǐngxiǎng a。
As a leader of the company, you should consider the overall significance of things.
我是经过了深思熟虑，才作出这样的决定的。
Wǒ shì jīngguò le shēnsī shúlǜ，cái zuòchū zhèyàng de juédìng de。
I made this decision after deep consideration.
你不要有太多的顾虑，束手束脚能做什么事呢？
Nǐ búyào yǒu tài duō de gùlǜ，shùshǒu shùjiǎo néng zuò shénme shì ne？
Don\'t think too much. What can you do if you have too many things on your mind?
大家考虑一下是否可以利用这片闲田开发房地产？
Dàjiā kǎolǜ yíxià shìfǒu kěyǐ lìyòng zhèpiàn xiántián kāifā fángdìchǎn？
Can we consider if it is possible to use this patch of spare land for real estate?
他还是依然故我，从不考虑别人的感受。
Tā háishi yīrán gùwǒ，cóngbùkǎolǜ biérén de gǎnshòu。
He still never thinks of others.
这家银行的办事效率太低，他正考虑把那几百万转存到别的地方。
Zhèjiā yínháng de bànshì xiàolǜ tài dī，tā zhèng kǎolǜ bǎ nà jǐ bǎi wàn zhuǎn cún dào bié de dìfāng。
The efficiency of this bank is so low that he is thinking about transfering his deposit of several million yuan to other places.
她是天生的乐天派，整天无忧无虑的。
Tā shì tiānshēng de lètiānpài，zhěngtiān wúyōu wúlǜ de。
She is a born optimist, and is always carefree.
如果考虑采光的话，可以选用玻璃砖来做墙。
Rúguǒ kǎolǜ cǎiguāng de huà，kěyǐ xuǎnyòng bōlízhuān lái zuò qiáng。
If we take the light into consideration, we can use glass blocks to make the wall.
他没有认真考虑，就草率地做了答复。
Tā méiyǒu rènzhēnkǎolǜ，jiù cǎoshuàide zuòledáfù。
He didn\'t think about it properly and came up with a careless reply.

没有经过详细考虑就急于接受一种意识形态真是太草率了。

她父亲有很大的顾虑让自己的女儿嫁给你。
Your itinerary does not include breaks for dinner.
你的旅行计划没有把吃饭的时间考虑进去。
a mature plan of action.
一个经过深思熟虑的行动计划
We have to take into consideration the parameter of practicality and artistry.
我们应该将艺术性和实用性等因素都考虑在内。

你应该优先考虑今年的广告预算。
Our top priority is not reducing cost but opening markets.
我们要优先考虑的不是如何降低成本而是如何打开销路。

合理的建议都应当给予考虑。

航行之前，我们得考虑风向的变化。

Tā duì zìjǐ de gòumǎi juédìng kǎolǜ zàisān。
他对自己的购买决定考虑再三。
He did respectably well for his age.
Kǎolǜ dào tā de niánlíng，tā zuò de xiāngdāng búcuò。
考虑到他的年龄，他做得相当不错。
It behooves us to reflect on this matter.
Wǒmen yǒu bìyào hǎohao kǎolǜ zhège wèntí。
我们有必要好好考虑这个问题。
The parity of the mother must be considered.
Mǔqīn shēngchǎn hòu de zhuàngkuàng bìxū kǎolǜ zàinèi。
母亲生产后的状况必须考虑在内。
Prescriptive grammar is concerned with norms of or rules for correct usage.
Guīdìng yǔfǎ kǎolǜ de wèntí shì rúhé wèi zhèngquè shǐyòng zhìdìng guīfàn huò guīzé。
规定语法考虑的问题是如何为正确使用制定规范或规则。
Third we must consider unemployment.
Dì-sān，wǒmen bìxū kǎolǜ dào shīyè wèntí。
第三，我们必须考虑到失业问题。
Scepticism about US financial policy is widespread in China.
zài Zhōngguó，rénmen pǔbiàn duì Měiguó jīnróngzhèngcè huáiyǒu yílǜ。
在中国，人们普遍对美国金融政策怀有疑虑。
Solving this requires two things to be addressed.
jiějué zhège wèntí xūyào kǎolǜ liǎngjiàn shì。
解决这个问题需要考虑两件事。
Regulation must take these differences into account.
Jiānguǎnjīgòu bìxū kǎolǜ zhèxiē chāyì。

But a handful of ideas are now being considered by Congress.
dàn mùqián měiguóguóhuì zhèngzài kǎolǜ yìxiē jiànyì。
但目前美国国会正在考虑一些建议。
But I am troubled by government officials\' relentless focus on Goldman.
dàn zhèngfǔguānyuán duì gāo shèng de wúqíng pēngjī ràng wǒ gǎndào yōulǜ。
但政府官员对高盛的无情抨击让我感到忧虑。
我说的也可能是废话，不过还是请你再考虑考虑。
Wǒ shuō de yě kěnéng shì fèihuà，búguò háishi qǐng nǐ zài kǎolǜ kǎolǜ。
What I said may seem superfluous, but I do hope you\'ll give it a little more thought.
你再考虑考虑，这样做太冒风险了。
Nǐ zài kǎolǜ kǎolǜ，zhèyàng zuò tài mào fēngxiǎn le。
You’d better think it over. It is too risky to do so.
认真考虑别人的意见
rènzhēn kǎolǜ biérén de yìjiàn 
consider other people\'s suggestions seriously
不予考虑
bùyǔ kǎolǜ 
refuse to take into consideration; will not consider
你要先考虑好再去，免得吃后悔药。
Nǐ yào xiān kǎolǜ hǎo zài qù，miǎn de chī hòuhuǐyào。
Think it over before you go so that you won\'t regret it later.
重新考虑
chóngxīn kǎolǜ 
reconsider
时间紧迫，我不能多考虑。
Shíjiān jǐnpò，wǒ búnéng duō kǎolǜ。
Time is running out, I can\'t give it much thought.
考虑各方面的意见
kǎolǜ gè fāngmiàn de yìjiàn
consider opinions from different quarters
划算不划算，不能只从本单位的利益考虑。
Huásuàn bùhuásuàn，bùnéng zhǐ cóngběn dānwèi de lìyì kǎolǜ。
One mustn\'t consider whether or not it pays simply from the standpoint of one\'s own unit.
不加考虑
bù jiā kǎolǜ 
not consider at all
考虑问题很精细
kǎolǜ wèntí hěn jīnɡxì
think matters over carefully; be circumspect
让我考虑一下再答复你。
Ràngwǒ kǎolǜ yíxià zài dáfù nǐ。
Let me think it over before I give you an answer.
这方面的情况你考虑了吗？
Zhè fāngmiàn de qíngkuàngnǐ kǎolǜ le ma?
Have you taken this aspect of the matter into account?
说话欠考虑
shuōhuà qiàn kǎolǜ
be too free with one\'s tongue
全盘考虑
quánpán kǎolǜ
give overall consideration to
他是可以考虑的人选。
Tā shì kěyǐ kǎolǜ de rénxuǎn。
He\'s an eligible candidate for the job.
给予认真的考虑
jǐyǔ rènzhēn de kǎolǜ
give serious consideration to
请容我考虑几天再作决定吧！
Qǐng róng wǒ kǎolǜ jǐtiān zài zuò juédìng ba！
Please give me a few days to consider before I make my decision.
审慎地考虑问题
shěnshèn de kǎolǜ wèntí
think over a problem carefully
所考虑的正是这一点。
Suǒ kǎolǜ de zhèng shì zhè yì diǎn。
That\'s just what we have under consideration.
做事要考虑实际效果，不能追求外面儿光。
Zuò shì yào kǎolǜ shíjì xiàoguǒ，bùnéng zhuīqiú wàimianrguāng。
In handling matters, we must pay attention to actual results and not try to be flashy.
这个问题要仔细考虑。
Zhège wèntí yào zǐxì kǎolǜ。
This question calls for careful consideration.
应予考虑
yīngyǔ kǎolǜ 
merit consideration
必须优先考虑的一个问题
bìxū yōuxiān kǎolǜ de yígè wèntí 
a question which claims precedence over all others; a first (or top) priority
再三考虑
zàisān kǎolǜ
consider over and over again
值得仔细考虑
zhídé zǐxì kǎolǜ 
warrant careful consideration
考虑周详
kǎolǜ zhōuxiánɡ 
give careful consideration to

Shì qián yào shènzhòngkǎolǜ，miǎn de fāshēngwèntí shí méi zhuānao。

考虑
kǎolǜ
think over; consider
考虑了许久，她决定罢诉。
Kǎolǜ le xǔjiǔ，tā juédìng bàsù。
After much thought, she decided to withdraw her case.
搬用别人的经验，也要考虑自身的实际情况。
Bānyòng biérén de jīngyàn，yěyào kǎolǜ zìshēn de shíjì qíngkuàng。
One should consider one\'s own reality, before applying the experience of others.
先把自己鼻子底下的事做好了，再考虑长远的吧！
Xiān bǎ zìjǐ bízi dǐxià de shì zuòhǎo le，zài kǎolǜ chángyuǎn de ba！
Take care of what’s right in front of you before worrying about the future.
他总是望子成龙，却没有考虑到孩子们的感受。

He longs to see his children succeed in life, but he neglects their feelings.
对他的辞讼请求，我们会认真考虑的。

We will seriously consider his resignation request.
他只知道打小算盘，从来都不考虑大家的利益。

He is calculating, and never shows consideration for the interests of others.
我们不能只搞短期行为，应该有更为长远的考虑。
Wǒmen bùnéng zhǐ gǎo duǎnqī xíngwéi，yīnggāi yǒu gèng wéi chángyuǎn de kǎolǜ。
We should not just set our eyes on short-term interests, but should instead be far-sighted.
虽然方方面面不能都考虑到，但也要力求做事严谨。
Suīrán fāngfāng miànmiàn bùnéng dōu kǎolǜ dào，dàn yěyào lìqiú zuòshì yánjǐn。
Although it is impossible to cover every aspect, we must strive for preciseness as much as we can.
他总是当时不考虑清楚，过去几天了才找后帐。
Tā zǒngshì dāngshí bùkǎolǜ qīngchu，guòqù jǐtiān le cái zhǎo hòuzhàng。
He never thinks things through when they happen, but blames others later.
请从现实考虑，不要做黄粱梦。
Qǐng cóng xiànshí kǎolǜ，búyào zuò huángliángmèng。
Please consider this realisticly, don\'t dream of something impossible.
我们去少数民族朋友家里时一定要考虑到他们的讳忌，以免闹出不愉快的事。
Wǒmen qù shǎoshù mínzú péngyou jiā lǐ shí yídìng yào kǎolǜ dào tāmen de huìjì，yǐmiǎn nàochū bùyúkuài de shì。

对于这个岛的命名，我们认真考虑了名从主人的原则。
Duìyú zhège dǎo de mìngmíng，wǒmen rènzhēn kǎolǜ le míngcóng zhǔrén de yuánzé。

考虑到晴雨伞的实用性，我也买了一把。

Jùlí hé shíjiān zhèxiē gǔlǎo de zhàng\'ài búhuì bèi yǔyǐ kǎolǜ。
距离和时间这些古老的障碍不会被予以考虑。
Planning needs to take account of the worst possible disaster.
Jìhuà bìxū kǎolǜ dào kěnéng chūxiàn de zuì zāogāo de zāinàn。
计划必须考虑到可能出现的最糟糕的灾难。

Tǔdì shǐyòng de biànhuà kěnéng bùdébù jǐyǔ kǎolǜ。
土地使用的变化可能不得不给予考虑。

噪音控制在建筑物的设计阶段就应纳入考虑范围之内。
The man in the car usually doesn\'t care about issues that are bigger than himself.
Tōngcháng， gāi nánzǐ zài chē shàng búhuì kǎolǜ bǐ zìjǐ gèng zhòngyào de wèntí。
通常，该男子在车上不会考虑比自己更重要的问题。
My parents were thinking about purchasing a new house.
Wǒ fùmǔ zài kǎolǜ mǎi yí dòng xīn fángzi。
我父母在考虑买一栋新房子。

I am thinking of buying a new car.
Wǒ zài kǎolǜ mǎi yí liàng xīn chē。

Wǒ huì zǐxì kǎolǜ nǐ shuō de huà。

你有时间去牙医那边把牙花子好好清理一下。

bá yá

西 (班牙语)英(语)词典
to have only a little Spanish
只一懂点西班牙语
to talk Spanish
讲西班牙语
Spanish is my native tongue.
西班牙语是我的母语。
He speaks most of his lines in Spanish.
他的多数台词是西班牙语。
dubbed into Spanish/French
用西班牙语/法语译配
In Spanish the adjective can be postponed after the word it modifies.
西班牙语中，形容词可以放在所修饰的词之后。
Spanish is derived from Latin.
西班牙语起源于拉丁语。

yǒu bǎifēnzhībǎi de bǎwò 
be a hundred percent sure; be absolutely certain
你这么做没有任何成功的把握，可是一步险棋啊！
Nǐ zhème zuò méiyǒu rènhé chénggōng de bǎwò，kěshì yíbùxiǎnqí a！
You are running a great risk, as you have little chance to succeed in doing this.
爸爸总说机不可失、时不再来，有了机会一定要把握住。
Bàba zǒngshuō jībùkěshī、shíbú zàilái，yǒu le jīhuì yídìngyào bǎwòzhù。
Dad often says that opportunity knocks only once, so one must take it when it comes.
我家的温度计上还带有湿度计，能够随时掌握室内的湿度。
Wǒjiā de wēndùjì shàng hái dàiyǒu shīdùjì，nénggòu suíshí zhǎngwò shìnèi de shīdù。
Attached to the thermometer at my home is a hygrometer, which can show the humidity in the room at any time.
握有重兵。
玄机在握，克敌有望。
有你当牵线人，这桩事就有把握了。
对取得胜利很有把握
他没有掌握射击要领，三枪都脱靶了。
有几分把握？
确有十二分把握。
Yet economic reformers now have an important card to play.
búguò，jīngjìgǎigé jiā mùqián wòyǒu yìzhāng wángpái。
不过，经济改革家目前握有一张王牌。
He takes the lead in any group.
Tā zhǎngwòle suǒyǒu tuánduì de lǐngdǎoquán。
他掌握了所有团队的领导权。
an absolute certainty
确实无疑，完全有把握
to feel sad, sick, certain, etc.
觉得悲伤、要呕吐、有把握等
a good investment
有把握的投资
pretty sure
相当有把握的
I\'m sure of it.
我对此事很有把握。
I\'m not sure about that.
对那件事我没有把握。
Are you sure about your decision?
你对你的决定有把握吗？
it is safe to say that...
可以有把握地说…
How can you be so sure?
你怎么这么有把握？
to be sure of (doing) sth
有把握（做）某事
to be unsure about sth
对某事没有把握
Billy is very confident that he can enter that university.
比利对进入那所大学很有把握。
It was the weakest thing she had ever done. It was totally unassured.
这是她最无力的举动，口气中一点也没有把握。
Don\'t fancy your chances during this unstable period.
Zài zhège dòngdàng shíqī， búyào guòyú zìxìn yǒu bǎwò。
在这个动荡时期，不要过于自信有把握。
He felt his feet were on solid ground，so he pushed forward with his ideas.
Tā gǎnjué zìjǐ hěn yǒu bǎwò，yúshì jiānjué zhíxíng tā de xiǎngfǎ。
他感觉自己很有把握，于是坚决执行他的想法。
You haven\'t got the heart for baseball.
Nǐ hái méiyǒu zhǎngwò dǎ bàngqiú de juéqiào。
你还没有掌握打棒球的诀窍。
His self-confidence is reflected in his firm handshake.
他有力的握手能让人感到他的自信。
to put one\'s finger on sth
[fig] 对某事有充分把握
He kept all the reins in his own hands.
Tā bǎ suǒyǒu quánlì zhǎngwòzài zìjǐ shǒulǐ。
他把所有权利掌握在自己手里。
to have (got) it made
[inf] 有成功的把握
I wouldn\'t have taken this project if I didn\'t have complete confidence.
我要是没有十足的把握，是不会接下这个项目的。

他很有自律，能把握好自己的时间，把事情完成。

jǐn wò shǒu zhōng qiāng

bǎwò shíjī

[frm] [+facts，information，documents] 掌握某事

可以有把握地说…

你怎么这么有把握？

她对社会问题掌握得准确无误。

握紧；坚持

bǎwò shíjī 
seize the opportunity; seize the right time

做这项工作，他很有把握。

有百分之百的把握
yǒu bǎifēnzhībǎi de bǎwò 
be a hundred percent sure; be absolutely certain
这部小说把握了我们时代的脉搏。
Zhèbù xiǎoshuō bǎwò le wǒmen shídài de màibó。
The novel throbs with the pulse of our times.

I am more than 100 per cent sure.
浮生并非若梦，命运还靠自己把握。

Life is not a dream, destiny is held in our own hands.
我们一定要把握好时机，打场漂亮的攻歼战。

We must take this good opportunity to fight an excellent eradication battle.
这件事有很大的或然性，所以谁也不敢说有十足的把握。

There are a lot of uncertainties in this matter. No one can say for sure what will happen.
机不可失，失不再来，所以一定要把握时机。

Opportunity knocks but once, so we must make the most of it.
海上航行时掌舵手要懂得把握风向，见风使舵。

他的这篇议论文并没有把握住主题的肯綮。

His argument does not get to the heart of the topic.

In order to solve problems well, you should grasp the essence of the problem.
爸爸总说机不可失、时不再来，有了机会一定要把握住。

Dad often says that opportunity knocks only once, so one must take it when it comes.
顺风吹火的机会你不及时把握，难道偏要逆水行舟？

He has no certainty of confidence on this matter.

他自信心很强，好像做任何事情都很有把握。

xiàn yǐ mièjué de dòngwù
extinct animals
许多古生物早已消灭了。
Xǔduō gǔshēngwù zǎo yǐ xiāomiè le。
Many prehistoric forms of life have long since died out.
有人说南戏已经灭绝了，可是也有人说它依然生动地活在如今的瓯剧、昆曲中。
Yǒurén shuō nánxì yǐjing mièjué le，kěshì yě yǒurén shuō tā yīrán shēngdòng de huózài rújīn de ōujù、kūnqǔ zhōng。
Some say that southern drama has been extinct, but others say that it still exists in the current Ou opera and Kunqu opera.
这种动物已几近灭绝。
Zhèzhǒng dòngwù yǐ jījìn mièjué。
This species of animal is on the verge of extinction.
这股顽匪已被劫灭净尽，再不能祸害百姓了。
Zhè gǔ wánfěi yǐ bèi jiémiè jìngjìn，zài bùnéng huòhài bǎixìng le。
The ganstershave been eliminated and can no longer harm the people.
新研制成的灭火剂已经大规模投入生产了。
Xīn yánzhì chéng de mièhuǒjì yǐjing dàguīmó tóurù shēngchǎn le。
The newly developed extinguisher has been put into mass production.
剩下的敌军已经被我们消灭了。
Shèngxià de díjūn yǐjing bèi wǒmen xiāomiè le。
We have wiped out the remaining enemy troops.
一些早已死灭的东西又沉渣泛起
天花病已经灭绝。
Scientists have discovered an extinct species of birds.
Kēxuéjiā men yǐ fāxiànle yì zhǒng yǐ mièjué de niǎolèi。
科学家们已发现了一种已灭绝的鸟类。
That housing boom has turned to bust.
Zhùzháishìchǎng de fánróngjǐngxiàng yǐjīng pòmiè。
住宅市场的繁荣景象已经破灭。
There used to be thousands of deer distributed throughout the plains but now they have been hunted almost to extinction.
这个平原上曾经有成百上千头鹿，现在它们已经濒临灭绝。
Surprisingly the curtain started to rise while the houselights were still undimmed.
Yìwài de shì，guānzhòngxí dēngguāng hái méiyǒu wánquán xīmiè shí，mùbù yǐjīng kāishǐ shēngqǐ le。
意外的是，观众席灯光还没有完全熄灭时，幕布已经开始升起了。
This tradition has left its mark indelibly upon the social, political, educational and industrial fabric of this country.
Zhè xiàng chuántǒng yǐjīng gěi zhège guójiā de shèhuì、 zhèngzhì、 jiàoyù hé gōngyè de dǐcéng jiégòu dǎ shàng le bùkěmómiè de yìnjì。
这项传统已经给这个国家的社会、政治、教育和工业的底层结构打上了不可磨灭的印记。
消灭城乡对立
xiāomiè chéngxiāng duìlì
abolish the antithesis between town and country
发扬火力，消灭敌人
fāyáng huǒlì，xiāomiè dírén
make full use of firepower to destroy the enemy
把敌人消灭光
bǎ dírén xiāomièguāng
wipe out the enemy
坚决消灭敢于来犯之敌。
Jiānjué xiāomiè ɡǎnyú láifàn zhī dí。
Resolutely wipe out any enemy that dares to invade our territory.
流窜在山区的残匪不久都被消灭了。
Liúcuàn zài shānqū de cán fěi bùjiǔ dōu bèi xiāomiè le。
The remaining bandits who fled to the hills were soon wiped out.
逐步消灭脑力劳动和体力劳动的差别
zhúbùxiāomiè nǎolì láodònghé tǐlì láodòng de chābié

Shèngxià de díjūn yǐjing bèi wǒmen xiāomiè le。

Dírén zài wánkànɡ jiù xiāomiè tā。

Xǔduō gǔshēngwù zǎo yǐ xiāomiè le。

zìxíngxiāomiè

消灭种族歧视
xiāomiè zhǒng zú qíshì
put an end to racial discrimination
战争的目的在于消灭战争。
Zhànzhēng de mùdì zàiyú xiāomiè zhànzhēng。
The aim of war is to eliminate war.
有效防治污染必须坚决消灭污染源。
Yǒuxiào fángzhì wūrǎn bìxū jiānjué xiāomiè wūrǎnyuán。
In order to prevent and dispose of pollution effectively, we must eliminate the polluting sources.
社会主义消灭了剥削阶级。
Shèhuìzhǔyì xiāomièle bōxuējiējí。
The Socialist system eliminates the exploiting class.
不远的将来，人类就能消灭艾滋病。
Bù yuǎn de jiānglái，rénlèi jiù néng xiāomiè àizībìng.

在进行手术之前，一定要进行消毒灭菌。
Zài jìnxíng shǒushù zhīqián，yídìng yào jìnxíng xiāodú mièjūn。
Disinfection, and sterilization is an inevitable procedure before an operation.

Huǒ miè le，yān hái méi xiāojìn。
The fire had gone out, but the smoke had not cleared yet.
消防队很快就把火灭了。
Xiāofángduì hěn kuài jiù bǎ huǒ miè le。
The fire brigade soon put out the fire.
消防员冒着生命危险扑灭森林大火。
Xiāofángyuán màozhe shēngmìngwēixiǎn pūmiè sēnlíndàhuǒ。
The firefighter put his life in danger to extinguish the forest fire.

liúxià nányǐmómiè de yìn xiàng
leave an indelible impression

zhúbùxiāomiè nǎolì láodònghé tǐlì láodòng de chābié

我军一举歼灭了盘踞海岛的敌人。
Wǒ jūn yìjǔ jiānmiè le pánjù hǎidǎo de dírén。

他的幻想破灭了。
Tā de huànxiǎngpòmiè le。

pūmiè huǒzāi
put out a fire

pūmiè wén yínɡ
wipe out mosquitoes and flies

quánbù jiānmiè rùqīn zhī dí

xiāomiè yíqiè gǎnyú rùqīn de dírén

sǎomiè xiǎogǔ cándí

shāmiè bìnɡyuán wēishēnɡwù

Dēngyì shǎn jiù miè le。
The light flashed and then went out.

bǎ huǒ tàmiè

Dēngtūrán dōu miè le。

xiāomiè zhǒng zú qíshì

Zhànzhēng de mùdì zàiyú xiāomiè zhànzhēng。

mièdǐng
be drowned

Our army has annihilated more than 300 of the enemy.

《Xìwéiliùjuéjù》（Dù Fǔ）：“ěrcáo shēn yǔ míng jùmiè，búfèi jiānghé wàngǔliú”。
In A Playful Quatrain, Du Fu wrote, &quot;Even if your bodies and names should perish, the flowing of the rivers will not stop.

Those unextinguished butts near the powder magazine could cause a fire at any time.
这场战役我军采取掎角之势，一举歼灭敌人。

这次军事演习中，假想敌被我方全部歼灭了。

这场战役打的是歼灭战，大家一定要全力以赴。

新研制成的灭火剂已经大规模投入生产了。

蒙混过关
ménghùnguòguān
get by under false pretences
希图蒙混过关
xītú ménghùn guòguān 
try to wangle; try to get by under false pretences
他伪造了经理的签名，企图蒙混过关。
Tā wěizào le jīnglǐ de qiānmíng，qǐtú ménghùn guòguān。
He counterfeited the manager\'s signature to get by under false pretences.
蒙混过关
ménghùnguòguān
muddle through

cáishuì zhìxù hùnluàn

管理混乱
guǎnlǐ hùnluàn 
bad management

This company has been stopped for an audit because of its messy management and tolerance of misconduct.

The situation is too confused now, so I have to make a careful observation before making a decision.

这个问题很可以研究一番。
Zhège wèntí hěn kěyǐ yánjiū yì fān。
This question is worth looking into.
他这番表演，真可谓淋漓尽致。
Tā zhè fān biǎoyǎn，zhēn kěwèi línlíjìnzhì。
He put on an act, which showed him up completely.
这番情景将永远镂刻在她的心中。
Zhè fān qíngjǐngjiāngyǒngyuǎn lòukè zài tā de xīn zhōng。
The scene would always be engraved on her memory.
我屡次三番提醒他要谨慎。
Wǒ lǚcìsānfān tíxǐngtā yào jǐnshèn。
I\'ve reminded him over and over again that he should be cautious.
我们轮番给锅炉添煤。
Wǒmen lúnfān gěi guōlú tiān méi。
We took turns stoking the furnaces.
轮番轰炸
lúnfān hōngzhà 
bomb in waves
听了同志们这番解释，老张心里明亮了。
Tīng le tóngzhìmen zhè fān jiěshì，Lǎo Zhāngxīnlǐ míngliàng le。
The comrades\' explanation helped Lao Zhang to straighten out his thinking.
他为什么讲这番话，真叫人莫名其妙。
Tā wèishénme jiǎngzhè fān huà，zhēn jiào rén mòmíngqímiào。
It is quite baffling why he should have made such remarks.
我几次三番劝他，他还是磨不过来。
Wǒ jǐcìsānfān quàn tā，tā háishi mò bú guòlái。
I had talked to him again and again, but he simply wouldn\'t come round.
听了这番话，我们大家心里暖呼呼的。

The words warmed our hearts.
听了她的一番劝慰，一股暖流涌上我的心头。

Her soothing words left me with a glow in my heart.
他谦虚了一番，终于答应来做一次演讲。
Tā qiānxū le yì fān，zhōng yú dāyìnglái zuò yícì yǎnjiǎng。
After making a few modest remarks he finally agreed to come and give a talk.
那天他们聚在一起热闹了一番。
Nà tiān tāmen jù zài yìqǐ rènao le yì fān。
That day they got together and had a jolly time.
他如此这般嘱咐了我一番。
Tā rúcǐ zhèbān zhǔfù le wǒ yìfān。
He told me that thus and so was to be done, in such and such a manner.
听了他那番话，我心里可真不是味儿。
Tīng le tā nà fān huà，wǒ xīnlǐ kě zhēn búshì wèir。
I was really upset to hear those words of his.
两个球队要较量一番，非见个输赢不可。
Liǎng gè qiúduì yào jiàoliàng yì fān，fēi jiàn gè shūyíng bùkě。
The two teams are determined to fight it out.
她爸爸的一番话说得她心悦诚服。
Tā bàba de yì fān huà shuō de tā xīnyuèchéngfú。
She was completely convinced by her father\'s arguments.
他紧张的心情，被我这一番笑谈，一下子冲得烟消云散了。
Tā jǐnzhāng de xīnqíng，bèi wǒ zhè yì fān xiàotán，yíxiàzi chōng de yānxiāo yúnsàn le。
At my friendly jesting, his tension melted away.
我揣摩不透他那番话的意味所在。
Wǒ chuǎimó bú tòu tā nà fān huà de yìwèi suǒzài。
I can\'t figure out the implications of what he said.
他把他看到的情形有声有色地描述了一番。
Tā bǎ tā kàndào de qíngxíngyǒushēngyǒusè de miáoshù le yì fān。
He gave a vivid and spirited description of what he had seen.
感谢你这番好意。
Gǎnxiè nǐ zhè fān hǎoyì。
I appreciate your kindness.
先生这番议论，真可谓之振聋发聩。
Xiānshēngzhè fān yìlùn，zhēn kěwèi zhī zhènlóngfākuì。
Your arguments, sir, would make a deaf man hear and a blind man see.
这事恐怕要费一番周折。
Zhè shì kǒngpà yào fèi yì fān zhōuzhé。

便步于春天的郊外，别有一番风景。

I felt strange about what he said.

看来我们得重起炉灶，自己做一番事业了。

此番前去，如有困难尽管去找张先生。

经过一番恶斗，拳坛又诞生了新拳王。

After a fierce battle, a new boxing champion emerged.

Tā de zhè fān yánlùn，lìngrén fālóngzhènkuì。
His arguments are really enlightening.

西红柿又叫作番茄，既是蔬菜又可以当水果吃。
