The Beijing 2008 Summer Olympic Games will promote, and carry out the spirit of the games.
北京新建的那个奥运场馆，仿照了鸟巢的结构造型。
Běijīng xīnjiàn de nàge àoyùnchǎngguǎn，fǎngzhào le niǎocháo de jiégòu zàoxíng。
The Olympic stadium just built in Beijing follows the structure of a nest.
Beijing government has begun to restrict the use of automobiles to create a better environment for Olympics Games 2008.
为了给2008年的北京奥运会创造更好的环境，北京市政府开始限制机动车的使用。
Many people in Beijing are willing to volunteer for the Olympic Games in 2008.
在北京许多人都希望成为2008年北京奥运会的志愿者。
He was told that he would get a promotion for winning a gold at the Beijing Games.
他被告知因他在北京奥运会上赢得金牌而获得晋升的消息。
Beijing invested a huge amount of money to the Olympics.
北京为奥运会投入了大量资金。
The 2008 Olympic Games will be the biggest ever sporting event ever held in Beijing.
2008年奥运会将会是北京有史以来举办的最盛大的体育赛事。
闭幕式后举行了授旗仪式，组委会将奥运会的会旗移授与下届的主办城市。
Bìmùshì hòu jǔxíng le shòuqí yíshì，zǔwěihuì jiāng àoyùnhuì de huìqí yíshòuyǔ xiàjiè de zhǔbàn chéngshì。
After the closing ceremony was the flag-giving ceremony, in which the committee transferred the flag of the Olympic Games to the next host.
The Olympic committee prepared a lot of remembrances for the foreign guests.
奥组委为外宾准备了很多纪念品。
Athens has been a headache to International Olympic Committee，not least because of infighting.
Yǎdiǎn yǐjīng lìng Guójìàozǔwěi dàwéitóuténg，yóuqí shì yóuyú nàli yǒu hùnzhàn。
雅典已经令国际奥组委大为头疼，尤其是由于那里有混战。
电视台将随时报道奥运赛场的零讯。
Diànshìtái jiāng suíshí bàodào àoyùn sàichǎng de língxùn。
The TV station will report scraps of news from the Olympics at intervals.
撑杆跳高是一项奥运会的比赛项目。
Chēnggāntiàogāo shì yíxiàng àoyùnhuì de bǐsài xiàngmù。
Pole Vault is a competitive event in the Olympic Games.
奥运会大赛点滴
Only the most skilled gymnasts make an olympic team.
Zhǐyǒu jìshù zuì hǎo de tǐcāo yùndòngyuán cáinéng jìnrù àoyùnhuì cānsài tuánduì。
只有技术最好的体操运动员才能进入奥运会参赛团队。
He placed 1st in the jerk event at the Olympics.
Tā huòdéle Àoyùnhuì tǐngjǔbǐsài de dì-yī míng。
他获得了奥运会挺举比赛的第一名。
All sports in the winter Olympic Games take place on ice or snow.
Dōngjì àolínpǐkè yùndònghuì de suǒyǒu bǐsài dōushì zài bīng shàng huòzhě xuě shàng jǔxíng。
冬季奥林匹克运动会的所有比赛都是在冰上或者雪上举行。
A new Olympic rule allows coaches to stand just off the playing area.
Xīn de Àolínpǐkè Yùndònghuì guīzé yǔnxǔ jiàoliàn zhàn zài jù bǐsài qūyù yídìng jùlí de dìfang nèi。
新的奥林匹克运动会规则允许教练站在距比赛区域一定距离的地方内。
The 2008 Olympic Games will be the biggest ever sporting event ever held in Beijing.
2008年奥运会将会是北京有史以来举办的最盛大的体育赛事。
闭幕式后举行了授旗仪式，组委会将奥运会的会旗移授与下届的主办城市。
Bìmùshì hòu jǔxíng le shòuqí yíshì，zǔwěihuì jiāng àoyùnhuì de huìqí yíshòuyǔ xiàjiè de zhǔbàn chéngshì。
After the closing ceremony was the flag-giving ceremony, in which the committee transferred the flag of the Olympic Games to the next host.
一篇关于奥运会的报道
yì piān guānyú Àoyùnhuì de bàodào
a news report about the Olympic Games
伤残人奥运会
shāngcánrén àoyùnhuì
Special Olympics (for the handicapped)
传播奥林匹克精神是北京2008奥运会的责任。
Chuánbō àolínpǐkè jīngshén shì Běijīng èrlínglíngbā àoyùnhuì de zérèn。
The Beijing 2008 Summer Olympic Games will promote, and carry out the spirit of the games.
中国积极争取残疾人奥运会的主办权。
Zhōngguó jījí zhēngqǔ cánjírén àoyùnhuì de zhǔbànquán。
China is actively bidding for the right to host the Paralympic Games.
撑杆跳高是一项奥运会的比赛项目。
Chēnggāntiàogāo shì yíxiàng àoyùnhuì de bǐsài xiàngmù。
Pole Vault is a competitive event in the Olympic Games.
他获得了上届奥运会撑竿跳高的金牌。
Tā huòdé le shàngjiè àoyùnhuì chēnggān tiàogāo de jīnpái。
He was the winner of the Pole Vault in the previous Olympic Games.
奥运会期间一定要做好城管工作。
Àoyùnhuì qījiān yídìng yào zuòhǎo chéngguǎn gōngzuò。
During the Olympic Games, we should manage the city well.
在他的导引下，我们参观了奥运会建设场地。
Zài tā de dǎoyǐn xià，wǒmen cānguān le àoyùnhuì jiànshè chǎngdì。
Under his guidance, we visited the construction sites for the Olympics.
奥运会前的最后一次封闭式训练，我国乒乓球队状态良好。
Àoyùnhuì qián de zuìhòu yícì fēngbìshì xùnliàn，wǒguó pīngpāngqiúduì zhuàngtài liánghǎo。
The players of the national table tennis team performed well in the last closed training before the Olympics.
四年一度的奥运会举世瞩目。
Sì nián yí dù de àoyùnhuì jǔshìzhǔmù。
The Olympic games, which is held every four years, attracts worldwide attention.
这个小姑娘是上届奥运会的平衡木冠军。
Zhège xiǎogūniang shì shàngjiè àoyùnhuì de pínghéngmù guànjūn。
The girl was the champion on the balance beam in the previous Olympic games.
奥运会的开幕式就是在这座体育场举行的。
Àoyùnhuì de kāimùshì jiùshì zài zhèzuò tǐyùchǎng jǔxíng de。
The opening ceremony of the Olympic Games was held in this stadium.
他获得了这届奥运会的挺举冠军。
Tā huòdé le zhè jiè àoyùnhuì de tǐngjǔ guànjūn。
He is the champion in this year\'s Olympics clean and jerk.
奥运会小球项目一般进行得比较早。
Àoyùnhuì xiǎoqiú xiàngmù yìbān jìnxíng de bǐjiàozǎo。
Small ball events such as pingpong and badminton usually start early.
选报奥运会的运动员都是优秀的。
Xuǎnbào àoyùnhuì de yùndòngyuán dōushì yōuxiù de。
The athletes who are selected to compete in the Olympic Games are all very excellent.
我国的运动健儿在奥运会上为国争了光。
Wǒ guó de yùndòng jiànér zài àoyùnhuì shàng wéiguó zhēng le guāng。
The sports masters have won our country honour in the Olympics.
我们至盼北京奥运会的召开。
Wǒmen zhìpàn Běijīng àoyùnhuì de zhàokāi。
We are expecting the holding of the Beijing Olympic Games.
我国的自由体操在奥运会上取得过辉煌的成绩。
Wǒ guó de zìyóu tǐcāo zài àoyùnhuì shàng qǔdé guò huīhuáng de chéngjì。
Our country\'s free exercise used to gain glorious achievements in the Olympic Games.
奥运会开幕式上，第一个节目是隆重的运动员入场式。
Àoyùnhuì kāimùshì shàng，dìyīgè jiémù shì lóngzhòng de yùndòngyuán rùchǎngshì。
At the opening ceremony of the Olympic Games, the first program is the grand march-in ceremony of the athletes.
蝉联奥运会冠军
chánlián àoyùnhuìguànjūn
be the reigning Olympic champion
奥运会进入了倒计时阶段。
Àoyùnhuì jìnrùle dàojìshí jiēduàn。
The countdown to the Olympics has begun.
申办奥运会
shēnbàn Àoyùnhuì
bid for the Olympics
上届奥运会冠军意外失手，卫冕失败。
Shàngjiè àoyùnhuì guànjūn yìwài shīshǒu，wèimiǎn shībài。
The previous Olympic champion let the contest slip through his fingers and lost the title.
据说奥运期间会解除“报禁”。
Jùshuō àoyùn qījiān huì jiěchú“bàojìn”。
I\'ve heard that during the Olympics, restrictions on the media will be lifted.
国家领导人亲切接见了残奥会中国代表团的运动员们。
Guójiā lǐngdǎorén qīnqiè jiējiàn le cánàohuì Zhōngguó dàibiǎotuán de yùndòngyuánmen。
The top leaders of the state met the athletes from the Chinese delegation of the Paralympics.
在2002年盐湖城冬季奥运会上，我国终于实现了金牌零的突破。
为申办奥运会创设条件
奥运会大赛点滴
奥运会的会标是五色环。
举办奥运会。
那次奥运会因二次大战的爆发而流产了。
申办奥运会。
问鼎奥运会。
四年一度的奥运会。
I read an interesting article this morning about the Olympic games.
今早我读了一篇有关奥运会的新闻，非常有趣儿。
Many people in Beijing are willing to volunteer for the Olympic Games in 2008.
在北京许多人都希望成为2008年北京奥运会的志愿者。
I missed the live broadcast of the Olympics.
我没赶上看奥运会的直播。
The 2008 Olympic Games will be the biggest ever sporting event ever held in Beijing.
2008年奥运会将会是北京有史以来举办的最盛大的体育赛事。
Some friends of mine are opening a book on the results of the next Olympic Games.
我的一些朋友正在为下次奥运会的结果下赌注。
Britain won third place at the games in Barcelona.
英国在巴塞罗那奥运会上得了第3名。
Beijing invested a huge amount of money to the Olympics.
北京为奥运会投入了大量资金。
His dream is to compete for an Olympic medal.
他的梦想是赢得奥运会冠军。
All of the people prayed for the success of the Olympics.
所有人都祈祷奥运会能成功。
He was told that he would get a promotion for winning a gold at the Beijing Games.
他被告知因他在北京奥运会上赢得金牌而获得晋升的消息。
Beijing government has begun to restrict the use of automobiles to create a better environment for Olympics Games 2008.
为了给2008年的北京奥运会创造更好的环境，北京市政府开始限制机动车的使用。
Ace athelets have been selected for the upcoming Olympics.
我们为即将到来的奥运会选拔了一流的运动员。
The 2008 Olympics proved a big success.
2008年奥运会取得了极大的成功。
The newspaper carried a special feature on the Olympics.
Zhè fèn bàozhǐ duì àoyùnhuì de jìnxíngle zhuāntíbàodào。
这份报纸对奥运会的进行了专题报道。
The athlete had an absolute desire to compete in the Olympics.
Zhège yùndòngyuán yìxīn zhǐ xiǎngzhe cānjiā àoyùnhuì。
这个运动员一心只想着参加奥运会。
You must be ambitious if you want to participate in the Olympics.
Rúguǒ nǐ xiǎng cānjiā àoyùnhuì，nàme nǐ bìxū jùyǒu jìnqǔxīn。
如果你想参加奥运会，那么你必须具有进取心。
He has bid for Olympic glory her whole life.
Tā de yìshēng dōu zài wèi àoyùnhuì de róngyù ér nǔlì。
他的一生都在为奥运会的荣誉而努力。
He placed 1st in the jerk event at the Olympics.
Tā huòdéle Àoyùnhuì tǐngjǔbǐsài de dì-yī míng。
他获得了奥运会挺举比赛的第一名。
The Olympics will be broadcasted to everyone in the world.
Àoyùnhuì jiāng xiàng měi gè rén zhuǎnbō。
奥运会将向每个人转播。
She had steeled herself for the Olympics in entire life.
Zhěnggè yìshēng，tā yǐ zuòhǎo sīxiǎngzhǔnbèi lái cānjiā àoyùnhuì。
整个一生，她已做好思想准备来参加奥运会。
Atlanta was chosen to be host for the olympic games.
Yàtèlándà bèixuǎnwéi àoyùnhuì zhǔbàn chéngshì。
亚特兰大被选为奥运会主办城市。
Each nation sent a contingent of athletes to the Olympics.
Měi gè guójiā dōu pàichūle yùndòngyuán dàibiǎotuán qù cānjiā àoyùnhuì。
每个国家都派出了运动员代表团去参加奥运会。
Only the most skilled gymnasts make an olympic team.
Zhǐyǒu jìshù zuì hǎo de tǐcāo yùndòngyuán cáinéng jìnrù àoyùnhuì cānsài tuánduì。
只有技术最好的体操运动员才能进入奥运会参赛团队。
She is training for the Olympics.
Tā zài wèi cānjiā àoyùnhuì ér xùnliàn。
她在为参加奥运会而训练。
He was an olympic swimmer.
Tā shì Àoyùnhuì yóuyǒng yùndòngyuán。
他是奥运会游泳运动员。
At the Olympic games, you can find athletes from all the nations of the world.
奥林匹克运动会上，你可以看到来自世界各国的运动员。
the honour of hosting the Olympic Games
主办奥林匹克运动会的光荣
He won a bronze medal for Britain in the 1952 Olympics.
Tā zài 1952 nián de àolínpǐkè yùndònghuì shàng wèi Yīngguó duódé yì méi tóngpái。
他在1952年的奥林匹克运动会上为英国夺得一枚铜牌。
All sports in the winter Olympic Games take place on ice or snow.
Dōngjì àolínpǐkè yùndònghuì de suǒyǒu bǐsài dōushì zài bīng shàng huòzhě xuě shàng jǔxíng。
冬季奥林匹克运动会的所有比赛都是在冰上或者雪上举行。
She is now seeking a sponsor to help her reach her dream of a place in the 2012 Olympics.
Tā zhèngzài xúnzhǎo yí wèi zànzhùshāng，yǐ shíxiàn tā cānjiā 2012 àolínpǐkè yùndònghuì de mèngxiǎng。
她正在寻找一位赞助商，以实现她参加2012奥林匹克运动会的梦想。
Another city is out of race to host the Olympic games.
Lìng yī gè chéngshì méiyǒu xīwàng huòdé Àolínpǐkè yùndònghuì de zhǔbànquán。
另一个城市没有希望获得奥林匹克运动会的主办权。
A new Olympic rule allows coaches to stand just off the playing area.
Xīn de Àolínpǐkè Yùndònghuì guīzé yǔnxǔ jiàoliàn zhàn zài jù bǐsài qūyù yídìng jùlí de dìfang nèi。
新的奥林匹克运动会规则允许教练站在距比赛区域一定距离的地方内。
The city was swelling with pride after it won the bid for the Olympics.
Zhège chéngshì wèi qǔdé Àolínpǐkè Yùndònghuì de jǔbànquán ér mǎnhuái zìháo。
这个城市为取得奥林匹克运动会的举办权而满怀自豪。
Yayuncun was proposed for the Olympic Village.
Yàyùncūn bèi tímíng wéi Àoyùncūn。
亚运村被提名为奥运村。
闭幕式后举行了授旗仪式，组委会将奥运会的会旗移授与下届的主办城市。
Bìmùshì hòu jǔxíng le shòuqí yíshì，zǔwěihuì jiāng àoyùnhuì de huìqí yíshòuyǔ xiàjiè de zhǔbàn chéngshì。
After the closing ceremony was the flag-giving ceremony, in which the committee transferred the flag of the Olympic Games to the next host.
Atlanta was chosen to be host for the olympic games.
Yàtèlándà bèixuǎnwéi àoyùnhuì zhǔbàn chéngshì。
亚特兰大被选为奥运会主办城市。
The city was swelling with pride after it won the bid for the Olympics.
Zhège chéngshì wèi qǔdé Àolínpǐkè Yùndònghuì de jǔbànquán ér mǎnhuái zìháo。
这个城市为取得奥林匹克运动会的举办权而满怀自豪。
Another city is out of race to host the Olympic games.
Lìng yī gè chéngshì méiyǒu xīwàng huòdé Àolínpǐkè yùndònghuì de zhǔbànquán。

The players of the national table tennis team performed well in the last closed training before the Olympics.

The Olympic games, which is held every four years, attracts worldwide attention.
他们十分渴慕那些奥运冠军们。
Tāmen shífēn kěmù nàxiē àoyùn guànjūnmen。
They admire those Olympic title-holders very much.

力图摆脱困境
lìtú bǎituō kùnjìnɡ 
strive to get out of a predicament

rènrén bǎibu

be at the mercy of others

听凭别人的摆布
tīngpíngbiéren de bǎibu 
be at the mercy of others
钟停摆了。
Zhōngtíngbǎi le。
The clock\'s stopped.
摆碗筷
bǎi wǎnkuài 
put out bowls and chopsticks for a meal; set (or lay) the table
大厅里的摆设给打了个稀里哗啦。
Dàtīnglǐ de bǎishè gěi dǎ le gè xīlǐhuālā。
All the furnishings in the hall were shattered into splinters.
不要摆噱头！
Búyào bǎixuétóu！
Don\'t try any tricks! or None of your tricks!
船身摇摆。
Chuánshēn yáobǎi。
The ship rocked.
左右摇摆
zuǒyòu yáobǎi 
vacillate now to the left, now to the right
摆开一字长蛇阵
bǎikāi yízì chángshézhèn 
draw up in single-line formation; string out in a long line
摆开阵势
bǎikāi zhènshì 
deploy the ranks in battle array
把问题摆到桌面上来
bǎ wèntí bǎidào zhuōmiàn shànglái 
place problems on the table; bring problems out into the open
单摆
dānbǎi
simple pendulum
他家的摆设跟整体装潢很配。

A change in the airflow destabilized the kite.
小王这人最喜欢为自己摆功了。

Xiaowang is always showing off.
把剪彩仪式搞得这么隆重，纯粹是摆花架子。

终于把您给盼来了，摆酒接风总是少不了的。

huíxìn dìzhǐ 
return address

地址
dìzhǐ
address

They decided on the most luxurious hotel in the city to hold their wedding reception.
我按着地址找过去，才发现他家已经迁走了。

I tried to find their house according to the address, but I only found that they had already moved somewhere else.

shēngqí yíshì
flag-raising ceremony

The flag and emblem are symbols of the party.

Shēng guóqí shí shǎoxiānduìyuán yào xíng duìlǐ。
While the national flag is being raised, all the young pioneers must salute.
来自各国的啦啦队员高擎着各国国旗。
Láizì gèguó de lālāduìyuán gāoqíng zhe gèguó guóqí。
Fans from different countries are holding aloft the national flags of their country.
我们要高扬法制民主的旗帜。
Wǒmen yào gāoyáng fǎzhì mínzhǔ de qízhì。
We should vigorously carry forward the flags of the legal system and democracy.
升旗仪式上，全场鹤立。
Shēngqí yíshì shàng，quánchǎng hèlì。
All the people stand in solemn silence during the flag-raising ceremony.
他被评为这个年度的红旗手，获得了公司的奖励。
Tā bèi píngwéi zhège niándù de hóngqíshǒu，huòdé le gōngsī de jiǎnglì。
He was appraised as the Excellent Worker of the Year and won a premium from the company.
他送来的这个花旗参很名贵。
Tā sònglái de zhège huāqísēn hěnmíngguì。
The gen-seng he sent here is very rare.
酒旗迎风展，酒香阵阵飘。
Jiǔqí yíngfēng zhǎn,jiǔxiāng zhènzhèn piāo.
The wineshop sign is billowing in the wind and the scent of wine is in the air.
妈妈有一件淡蓝色的绢绸旗袍，特别漂亮！
Māma yǒu yíjiàn dànlánsè de juànchóu qípáo，tèbié piàoliàng！
Mother has a light blue silk cheongsam, it is very beautiful.
你看那些国旗班的战士，都是些俊伟帅气的小伙儿！
Nǐ kàn nàxiē guóqíbān de zhànshì，dōushì xiē jùnwěi shuàiqì de xiǎohuǒr！
You see those soldiers from the national flag squad? All of them are strong and handsome young men.
那副绣凤凰的白色靠旗是《杨门女将》中穆桂英用的。
Nà fù xiù fènghuáng de báisè kàoqí shì《Yángménnǚjiàng》 zhōng Mù Guìyīng yòng de。
The white armor flags embroidered with phoenixes are used by Muguiying in the play Women Generals of the Yang Family.
为了这次演出，她特意定做了一身可体的旗袍。
Wèile zhècì yǎnchū，tā tèyì dìngzuò le yì shēn kětǐ de qípáo。
She made a cheongsam especially for this performance that fits her very well.
城头上有一面大旗在猎猎飘扬。
Chéngtóu shàng yǒu yímiàn dàqí zài lièliè piāoyáng。
On the city wall, there is a big flag flying.
城楼上有一面大旗临空招展。
Chénglóu shàng yǒu yímiàn dàqí línkōng zhāozhǎn。
On the city tower, there is a big flag fluttering in the sky.
广场上的旗帜在大风中漫卷飘扬。
Guǎngchǎng shàng de qízhì zài dàfēng zhōng mànjuǎn piāoyáng。
The flag on the square is fluttering freely in the strong wind.
爸爸小学时候的班主任是个旗人。
Bàba xiǎoxué shíhou de bānzhǔrèn shì gè qírén。
The class adviser of my father when he was in the elementary school was Manchurian.
今天在晚会上，她穿了一身漂亮的旗装。
Jīntiān zài wǎnhuì shàng，tā chuān le yìshēn piàoliàng de qízhuāng。
At today\'s evening party, she is dressed in splendid Manchu attire.
三国时期的诸侯们都打着清君侧的旗号为已谋利。
Sānguó shíqī de zhūhóumen dōu dǎ zhe qīngjūncè de qíhào wèiyǐ móulì。

升旗仪式前，天安门广场上群聚了许多观礼的人。

我们在党旗下庄严的宣讲过誓辞，要为共产主义事业奋斗终生。
Wǒmen zài dǎngqí xià zhuāngyán de xuānjiǎng guò shìcí，yào wèi gòngchǎnzhǔyì shìyè fèndòu zhōng shēng。
We have sworn solemnly under the party flag that we will work for Communism all our lives.
这学期，我们班首夺了流动红旗。
Zhè xuéqī，wǒmen bān shǒuduó le liúdòng hóngqí。
Our class was the first one to get the flowing red flag this term.
她身穿一件素缎的旗袍，显得妩媚动人。
Tā shēn chuān yíjiàn sùduàn de qípáo，xiǎnde wǔmèi dòngrén。
She wore a white cheongsam, it was very charming.
她那件白底碎花儿小旗袍很漂亮。
Tā nà jiàn báidǐ suìhuār xiǎo qípáo hěnpiàoliàng。

Zhège yíqì zhǔyào shì yònglái jiǎncè dīyīn de。
This instrument is mainly used to monitor low-pitched sounds.
这个仪器可以检测到微弱的地波。
Zhège yíqì kěyǐ jiǎncè dào wēiruò de dēbō。
This instrument can detect weak surface waves.
漏刻是古代的计量时间的仪器。
Lòukè shì gǔdài de jìliáng shíjiān de yíqì。
An hourglass was an instrument used to measure time in ancient times.
仪器可以检测到他的心脏在有节奏地律动。
Yíqì kěyǐ jiǎncèdào tā de xīnzàng zài yǒu jiézòu de lǜdòng。
The instrument can detect his regular heartbeats.
这个仪器可以检测大气中的哨声。
Zhège yíqì kěyǐ jiǎncè dàqì zhōng de shàoshēng。
This instrument can examine noise in the environment.
这台仪器可以记录植物体中生物电的变化。
Zhètái yíqì kěyǐ jìlù zhíwùtǐ zhōng shēngwùdiàn de biànhuà。
This instrument can record the changes of bioelectricity in plants.
这个仪器已经失准了，需要进行重新调试。
Zhège yíqì yǐjing shīzhǔn le，xūyào jìnxíng chóngxīn tiáoshì。
This instrument has lost its accuracy and needs adjusting.
这项仪器，只适用于中老年患者。
Zhè xiàng yíqì，zhǐ shìyòngyú zhōng lǎonián huànzhě。
This equipment is only suitable for middle and old age patients.
由于灵敏度太低，这种仪器已经被淘汰了。
Yóuyú língmǐndù tài dī，zhèzhǒng yíqì yǐjing bèi táotài le。
Because of lack of sensitivity, the apparatus has already fallen into disuse.

这个仪器不需要人工操作就可以自动为船导航。

Shēngxué yíqì cóng yǔyán de xiǎo dānyuán kāishǐ。

Zài xiāngcūn，cízào de yíshì shì hěnzhòngyào de。
The ceremony of sending out the kitchen god is very important in the village.
寺院的打鬼仪式就要开始了。
Sìyuàn de dǎguǐ yíshì jiùyào kāishǐ le。
The rite of dancing to exorcise demons will soon be held in the temple.
这个仪器主要是用来检测低音的。
Zhège yíqì zhǔyào shì yònglái jiǎncè dīyīn de。
This instrument is mainly used to monitor low-pitched sounds.
这个仪器可以检测到微弱的地波。
Zhège yíqì kěyǐ jiǎncè dào wēiruò de dēbō。
This instrument can detect weak surface waves.
当仪仗方队经过主席台时，观众席上一片欢呼。
Dāng yízhàng fāngduì jīngguò zhǔxítái shí，guānzhòngxí shàng yípiàn huānhū。
People cheered when the  guard of honor walked past the  platform.
《神雕侠侣》的关机仪式已在北京举行。
《Shéndiāoxiálǚ》 de guānjīyíshì yǐ zài Běijīng jǔxíng。
The closing ceremony for &quot;A Couple of Chivalrous Swordsmen and their Supernatural Eagles&quot; was held in Beijing.
仪表中的光电池已经老化，赶快更新吧。
Yíbiǎo zhōng de guāngdiànchí yǐjing lǎohuà，gǎnkuài gēngxīn ba。
The photoelectric battery in the instrument is aging. We should replace it with a new one as quickly as possible.
这台光谱仪是新引进的，精密程度很高。
Zhètái guāngpǔyí shì xīn yǐnjìn de，jīngmì chéngdù hěngāo。
This imported spectrocomparator has a high level of precision.
合卺这种仪式，在古代很盛行。
Héjǐn zhèzhǒng yíshì，zài gǔdài hěnshèngxíng。
The ritual of Hejin ((of bride and bridegroom drinking from the nuptial cup) was very popular in ancient China.
朋友结婚，我们给他送去了贺仪。
Péngyou jiéhūn，wǒmen gěi tā sòngqù le hèyí。
We sent him a wedding gift.
升旗仪式上，全场鹤立。
Shēngqí yíshì shàng，quánchǎng hèlì。
All the people stand in solemn silence during the flag-raising ceremony.
在古代，人们要举行祭拜仪式以感谢皇天后土的恩赐。
Zài gǔdài，rénmen yào jǔxíng jìbài yíshì yǐ gǎnxiè huángtiān hòutǔ de ēncì。
In ancient times, people used to offer sacrifices to  heaven, and earth to express their gratitude for its favors.
随着技术的不断提高，绘图仪也越来越精准了。
Suí zhe jìshù de búduàn tígāo，huìtúyí yě yuèláiyuè jīngzhǔn le。
Graphic plotters are becoming more and more accurate as technology improves continuously.
当房屋架起脊檩，建房者会举行庆祝仪式。
Dāng fángwū jiàqǐ jǐlǐn，jiànfángzhě huì jǔxíng qìngzhù yíshì。
When ridge-poles are put up in a house, its owner will hold a celebration.
祭灵仪式上不许乱说话，要尊重死者。
Jìlíng yíshì shàng bùxǔ luàn shuōhuà，yào zūnzhòng sǐzhě。
Don\'t talk casually at the worship ceremony. We should show our respect to the dead.
在祭祀仪式中祭司是必须在场的。
Zài jìsì yíshì zhōng jìsī shì bìxū zàichǎng de。
A priest should be present at a worshipping ceremony.
礼仪老师正在教孩子们如何待人接物。
Lǐyí lǎoshī zhèngzài jiāo háizimen rúhé dàirén jiēwù。
The etiquette teacher is teaching children how to get along well with others.
作为一个合格的军人，必须仪表整洁军姿威武。
Zuòwéi yígè hégé de jūnrén，bìxū yíbiǎo zhěngjié jūnzī wēiwǔ。
As a qualified soldier, you must keep your uniform tidy and have powerful posture.
礼仪电报为我们的生活和商务交往带来了很大的便利。
Lǐyí diànbào wèi wǒmen de shēnghuó hé shāngwù jiāowǎng dàilái le hěndà de biànlì。
Ceremonial telegraph has brought great convenience to our life, and business.
这台天文测量仪的量程是以光年计算的。
Zhètái tiānwén cèliángyí de liàngchéng shì yǐ guāngnián jìsuàn de。
The measure range of this astronomical measurement apparatus is calculated in light-years.
他走进了龙庭，开始祭天仪式。
Tā zǒujìn le lóngtíng，kāishǐ jìtiān yíshì。
He went into the imperial court and began the rite of worshipping Heaven.
漏刻是古代的计量时间的仪器。
Lòukè shì gǔdài de jìliáng shíjiān de yíqì。
An hourglass was an instrument used to measure time in ancient times.
仪器可以检测到他的心脏在有节奏地律动。
Yíqì kěyǐ jiǎncèdào tā de xīnzàng zài yǒu jiézòu de lǜdòng。
The instrument can detect his regular heartbeats.
古时候，送礼物时附上自己的名帖，是一种礼仪。
Gǔshíhou，sòng lǐwù shí fùshàng zìjǐ de míngtiè，shì yìzhǒng lǐyí。
In ancient times, it was etiquette to present your full-size visiting card when giving someone a gift.
升旗仪式前，天安门广场上群聚了许多观礼的人。

Before the beginning of the flag-raising ceremony, many people gathered in groups in Tiananmen Square.
今天全校师生都参加了少先队员的入队仪式。

Today, all teachers and students attended the initiation ceremony of the Young Pioneers.
我在用扫描仪把照片扫描进电脑里。
Wǒ zài yòng sǎomiáoyí bǎ zhàopiàn sǎomiáo jìn diànnǎo lǐ。
I am using the scanner to scan the pictures into the computer.
这个仪器可以检测大气中的哨声。

This instrument can examine noise in the environment.

这台仪器可以记录植物体中生物电的变化。

This instrument can record the changes of bioelectricity in plants.

Zhèsōuchuán shàng ānzhuāng le liǎng tái shēngnà tàncèyí。
This ship is installed with two sonar detectors.
这个仪器已经失准了，需要进行重新调试。
Zhège yíqì yǐjing shīzhǔn le，xūyào jìnxíng chóngxīn tiáoshì。
This instrument has lost its accuracy and needs adjusting.
仪仗队已经整整齐齐的排在了广场上，等待受检。

The honor guards are in ordered lines in the square, waiting for review.

Bìmùshì hòu jǔxíng le shòuqí yíshì，zǔwěihuì jiāng àoyùnhuì de huìqí yíshòuyǔ xiàjiè de zhǔbàn chéngshì。
After the closing ceremony was the flag-giving ceremony, in which the committee transferred the flag of the Olympic Games to the next host.
这种最新型的探测仪价格不菲。
Zhèzhǒng zuì xīnxíng de tàncèyí jiàgé bùfěi。

我公司引进了两台新型的探伤仪。
Wǒ gōngsī yǐnjìn le liǎng tái xīnxíng de tànshāngyí。

由民主党人任总统的白宫
The crowds congregated in front of the Vatican on Christmas eve.

参观故宫已经被列入我们行程的计划了。

按照事先排定的行程，今天我们参观了故宫。

我们参观了故宫博物院。
Wǒmen cānguānle Gùgōngbówùyuàn。
We toured the Forbidden City museum.
故宫里宝贝多了，洋洋大观，让人目不暇接。

There are so many spectacular treasures in the Imperial Palace that it is impossible to take all of it in.
We went on a guided tour around the Forbidden City in Beijing.
导游带领我们参观了北京故宫。
在中国传统音乐中，九宫既有宫又有调。
Zài Zhōngguó chuántǒng yīnyuè zhōng，jiǔgōng jìyǒu gōng yòuyǒu diào。
In traditional Chinese music, the nine gongs include both gongs and notes. Gongs are the note of the lowest string of the pipa.
故宫也被称作紫禁城。
Gùgōng yě bèi chēngzuò zǐjìnchéng。
The Imperial Palace is also called the Forbidden City.
故宫的三大殿都建筑在北京城的中轴线上。
紫禁城是我国现存的最大最完整的古代宫殿建筑群。
宫禁上写着：“子时之后不准进出宫门”。
Gōngjìn shàng xiě zhe ：“zǐshí zhīhòu bùzhǔn jìnchū gōngmén”。
The palace prohibition says: &quot;No one goes through the palace door after 1 a.m..&quot;

Liǎng wèi gōngnǚ zài huángdì shēnhòu shǒuchí gōngshàn。
Two maids are standing behind the Emperor with a round fan in their hands.
在中国传统音乐中，九宫既有宫又有调。

In traditional Chinese music, the nine gongs include both gongs and notes. Gongs are the note of the lowest string of the pipa.
在帝王的后宫中，六宫争宠的事并不罕见。
Zài dìwáng de hòugōng zhōng，liùgōng zhēngchǒng de shì bìngbùhǎnjiàn。
In imperial harems, it was a common thing that the empress and concubines fought for the love of the emperor.

封建时代，后宫的妃子都以得到皇上的宠幸为荣耀。

《Jīnlóuzi·Lìyán》：“Zhìrú wénzhě，wéixū qǐgǔ fēngpī，gōngzhēng mímàn，chúnwěn qiúhuì，qínglíng yáodàng。”。
Jin Lou Zi·Li Yan:&quot;As to writers, they just has to dress gorgeously with an excellent eloquence and a sensitive mind. &quot;
我把故宫的历史大概齐地了解了一下。

皇帝死后被安放在这座地宫里。

这些珍贵的古籍都保存在寺庙的地宫里面。

这次行刺，可能是东宫所为。
Zhècì xíngcì，kěnéng shì dōnggōng suǒwéi。
The assassination was plotted by the prince.
起义的士兵攻占了冬宫。
Qǐyì de shìbīng gōngzhàn le dōnggōng。
Revolting soldiers attacked and occupied the Winter Palace.
梵宫古庙，历来都建造在幽静山水之间。
Fàngōng gǔmiào，lìlái dōu jiànzào zài yōujìng shānshuǐ zhījiān。
Buddhist temples are usually built in the mountains or by the riverside.
这座明代宫殿的房柁用的可是名贵木材。
Zhèzuò míngdài gōngdiàn de fángtuó yòng de kěshì míngguì mùcái。
The main beam of the roof of this palace built in the Ming dynasty was made of precious wood.
他曾经在宫中伺候老佛爷。
Tā céngjīng zài gōng zhōng cìhòu lǎofóye。
He used to be a servant of the Empress Dowager Cixi.
后宫干政现象引起了我的兴趣。

这些群众演员扮演宫娥。
Zhèxiē qúnzhòng yǎnyuán bànyǎn gōngé。
These actors play the maids in imperial palace.
宫禁秘闻总能激发人们的好奇心。
Gōngjìn mìwén zǒngnéng jīfā rénmen de hàoqíxīn。
People are always curious about secrets within the palace precincts.
我们在宫墙下照张相吧。
Wǒmen zài gōngqiáng xià zhào zhāng xiàng ba。

Zhèbǎ gōngshàn shì sònggěi nǐ de shēngrì lǐwù。

在古代，宫室的建造有很多讲究。
Zài gǔdài，gōngshì de jiànzào yǒu hěnduō jiǎngjiū。
In ancient times, there were many rules for constructing a palace.
皇上正在宫廷会见大臣。
Huángshàng zhèngzài gōngtíng huìjiàn dàchén。
The Emperor is meeting his ministers at the imperial court.
这场宫廷政变的幕后操纵者是当朝的太后。
Zhèchǎng gōngtíng zhèngbiàn de mùhòu cāozòngzhě shì dāngcháo de tàihòu。
This palace coup was secretly controlled by the mother of the present emperor.
皇家的宫苑是不许百姓进入的，只能皇帝带领大臣打猎游玩。
Huángjiā de gōngyuàn shì bùxǔ bǎixìng jìnrù de，zhǐnéng huángdì dàilǐng dàchén dǎliè yóuwán。
The common people are not allowed to enter the palatial gardens. Only the emperor has the right to bring his ministers to the palatial gardens for hunting and sight-seeing.
他是故宫博物院的馆员，对古代名人字画很有研究。
Tā shì Gùgōng bówùyuàn de guǎnyuán，duì gǔdài míngrén zìhuà hěnyǒu yánjiū。
He works at the Forbidden City and knows a lot about ancient calligraphy and paintings of famous people.
故宫太和殿的横匾上写着“建极绥猷”。
Gùgōng Tàihédiàn de héngbiǎn shàng xiě zhe “jiànjísuíyóu”。
&quot;Jianjisuiyou&quot; (meaning a peaceful great country under law and order) was written on the inscribed horizontal board on the Hall of Supreme Harmony in the Palace Museum of Beijing.
话说五百年前，有只大闹天宫的猴子被压在这里。
Huàshuō wǔbǎi niánqián，yǒu zhī dànào tiāngōng de hóuzi bèi yāzài zhèlǐ。
The story goes like this: 500 years ago, a monkey who  made big trouble in the heavenly palace was pressed under the mountain here.
现在的雍和宫属于黄教的寺庙，香火很旺。
Xiànzài de yōnghégōng shǔyú huángjiào de sìmiào，xiānghuǒ hěnwàng。
Now Yonghegong is a temple belonging to the Yellow Hats, and it is very prosperous.
我要用这张九宫格儿练毛笔字。
Wǒ yào yòng zhèzhāng jiǔgōnggér liàn máobǐzì。
I want to practise my handwriting with special paper containing big squares divided into nine smaller ones.
这些聚珍版如今都珍藏在故宫博物院。
Zhèxiē jùzhēnbǎn rújīn dōu zhēncáng zài Gùgōng bówùyuàn。
These jeweled editions are collected by the Palace Museum now.
地下宫殿里面冷森森的。
Dìxià gōngdiàn lǐmian lěngsēnsēn de。
Inside the underground palace, it is very cold.
皇帝出京一般是在离宫中居住。
Huángdì chūjīng yìbān shì zài lígōng zhōng jūzhù。
When the emperors came out of  the capital, they often lived in summer or winter palace.
封建时代皇家立嗣处理不好往往会引发宫廷内乱。
Fēngjiàn shídài huángjiā lìsì chǔlǐ bùhǎo wǎngwǎng huì yǐnfā gōngtíng nèiluàn。
In feudal times, the inappropriate decisions of the successor to the throne often lead to civil strife in the court.
参观故宫已经被列入我们行程的计划了。
Cānguān gùgōng yǐjing bèi lièrù wǒmen xíngchéng de jìhuà le。
A visit to the Imperial Palace has already been included in our schedule.
闾里的生活是身处皇宫的人所不知道的。
Lǘ lǐ de shēnghuó shì shēnchǔ huánggōng de rén suǒ bùzhīdào de。
People living in the palace have no idea about life in the countryside.
穿过这个门洞就可以看到故宫的大门了。
Chuānguò zhège méndòng jiù kěyǐ kàndào Gùgōng de dàmén le。
After passing through the doorway, you can see the gate of the Forbidden City.
皇帝突然密召大臣们进宫议事。
Huángdì tūrán mìzhào dàchénmen jìngōng yìshì。
All at once, the emperor secretly summoned cabinet ministers to the court to discuss official business.
他将密诏藏在箱子里面，偷偷带出了皇宫。
Tā jiāng mìzhào cángzài xiāngzi lǐmian，tōutōu dàichū le huánggōng。
He hid the secret imperial edicts in the box, and took them out of the palace.
按照事先排定的行程，今天我们参观了故宫。
Ànzhào shìxiān páidìng de xíngchéng，jīntiān wǒmen cānguān le gùgōng。
According to the schedule, we will visit the Imperial Palace today.
那些古代宫殿的柱子上，全都雕刻着蟠龙。
Nàxiē gǔdài gōngdiàn de zhùzi shàng，quándōu diāokè zhe pánlóng。
The pillars in those ancient palaces are carved with curling dragons.
小明在少年宫学习七弦琴。
Xiǎo Míng zài shàoniángōng xuéxí qīxiánqín。
Xiao Ming is studying to play the guqin in the children\'s palace.
宫殿里华丽的装潢都是出自能工巧匠之手。
Gōngdiàn lǐ huálì de zhuānghuáng dōushì chūzì nénggōng qiǎojiàng zhī shǒu。
The gorgeous decoration in the palace comes from the hands of skillful craftsmen.
我曾经在青年宫学过国画。
Wǒ céngjīng zài qīngniángōng xuéguò guóhuà。
I once learnt traditional Chinese painting in the Youth Palace.
我曾经在少年宫学习过两年中国象棋。
Wǒ céngjīng zài shǎoniángōng xuéxíguo liǎng nián zhōng guó xiàng qí。
I have studied Chinese chess in the Children\'s Palace for two years.
水晶宫饭店是天津的高级酒店。
Shuǐjīnggōng fàndiàn shì Tiānjīn de gāojí jiǔdiàn。
The Crystal Palace Hotel is the highest class hotel in Tianjin.
传说嫦娥就住在月亮里的水晶宫。
Chuánshuō Cháng\'é jiù zhùzài yuèliàng lǐ de shuǐjīnggōng。
It is said that Chang\'e lives in the Moon Palace.
孙悟空初到水晶宫，就抢走了老龙王的定海神针。
Sūnwùkōng chū dào shuǐjīnggōng，jiù qiǎngzǒu le lǎolóngwáng de dìnghǎishénzhēn。
The first time the Monkey King went to the Dragon Palace, he grabbed the old Dragon King\'s Divine Needle which guarded the sea.
传说中过了天门就是天宫了。
Chuánshuō zhōng guò le tiānmén jiùshì tiāngōng le。
Legend has it that once you pass heaven\'s door, you get into heaven.
过了这道天门就到了皇帝的寝宫了。
Guò le zhè dào tiānmén jiù dào le huángdì de qǐngōng le。
After you pass the door of the royal palace, you arrive at the sleeping quarters of the emperor.
据说皇宫里有专门的厨师给皇帝温酒。
Jùshuō huánggōng lǐ yǒu zhuānmén de chúshī gěi huángdì wēnjiǔ。
It is said there were cooks who specialized in warming wines for the emperor.
每个星期天，贝贝都会到文化宫学习芭蕾舞。
Měigè xīngqītiān，Bèibèi dōuhuì dào wénhuàgōng xuéxí bālěiwǔ。
Every Sunday, Bei Bei goes to the cultural palace to learn ballet.
宫、商、角、徵、羽被古人称为“五声”。
Gōng、shāng、jiǎo、zhēng、yǔ bèi gǔrén chēngwéi“wǔshēng”。
The ancient people refer to gong, shang,jiao,zhi,yu as the five notes.
戏园子里正在演出《大闹天宫》这部戏。
Xìyuánzǐ lǐ zhèngzài yǎnchū《Dànào tiāngōng》zhèbù xì。
The play &quot;The Monkey Creates Havoc in Heaven&quot; is  in the theatre.
故宫里有很多绣品，都是当年民间进贡的。
Gùgōng lǐ yǒu hěnduō xiùpǐn，dōushì dāngnián mínjiān jìngòng de。
There are a lot of embroideries in the Palace Museum. They were all tributes paid by the common people to the Emperor.
故宫里有测量天象的璇玑。
Gùgōng lǐ yǒu cèliáng tiān xiàng de xuánjī。
In the Palace Museum, there is an armillary sphere used for observing astronomical phenomena.
皇太后的懿旨请你火速进宫议事。
Huángtàihòu de yìzhǐ qǐng nǐ huǒsù jìngōng yìshì。
The decree of the empress dowager asks you to enter the palace and discuss issues immediately.
广寒宫在云汉之上。
Guǎnghángōng zài yúnhàn zhīshàng。
The Moon Palace is above the clouds.
她不幸患上子宫癌，不得不放弃做妈妈的想法。
Tā búxìng huànshàng zǐgōngái，bùdébùfàngqì zuò māma de xiǎngfǎ。
Unfortunately, she had uterus cancer and had to give up the idea of having children.
医生检查她的子宫颈后，建议她进行活体病理检查以排除癌症的可能。
Yīshēng jiǎnchá tā de zǐgōngjǐng hòu，jiànyì tā jìnxíng huótǐ bìnglǐ jiǎnchá yǐ páichú áizhèng de kěnéng。
After checking on her cervix, the doctor suggested she run a biopsy to eliminate the possibility of cancer.
故宫里宝贝多了，洋洋大观，让人目不暇接。
Gùgōng lǐ bǎobèi duō le，yángyáng dàguān，ràng rén mùbùxiájiē。
There are so many spectacular treasures in the Imperial Palace that it is impossible to take all of it in.
宫廷政变一般伴随着权力的交替。
Gōngtíng zhèngbiàn yìbān bànsuízhe quánlì de jiāotì。
Power change always comes along with a palace coup.
《大闹天宫》是我最喜欢看的美术片。
《Dànàotiāngōng》 shì wǒ zuì xǐhuan kàn de měishùpiàn。
Adventures in the Heavenly Palace is my favorite cartoon.
医生说她子宫内形成的葡萄状透明水泡样胚胎是个葡萄胎。
Yīshēng shuō tā zǐgōng nèi xíngchéng de pútáozhuàng tòumíng shuǐpào yàng pēitāi shì gè pútáotāi。
The doctor said that the grape-shaped transparent sample embryo in her womb was a vesicular mole.
一般来说，皇后娘娘是不会住在西宫的。

检查质量
jiǎnchá zhìliàng
check on the quality of sth.
要认真对待质量检查，切不可打马虎眼

检查质量
jiǎnchá zhìliàng
check on the quality of sth.

yángé jiǎnyàn chǎnpǐn zhìliàng
strictly examine the quality of the products
经检查，产品质合格。

Zhè wèi kēxuéjiā zài bùtóng de shíyànshì chóngfù tóng yí gè shìyàn yǐ jiǎnyàn tā de lǐlùn。
这位科学家在不同的实验室重复同一个试验以检验他的理论。
Doubt by itself is not the final test of truth.
Huáiyí běnshēn bìng bú shì zhēnlǐ de zuìzhōng jiǎnyàn。
怀疑本身并不是真理的最终检验。
A test print was made and checked prior to full production.

全面投入生产之前，我们会检验试出版的结果。

It seems timely, at this point, to examine what we all understand by the term creative.

A scientific hypothesis that survives experimental testing becomes a scientific theory.

交通警察正在突击检查违规车辆。
Jiāotōng jǐngchá zhèngzài tūjī jiǎnchá wéiguī chēliàng。
Traffic policemen are having a surprise inspection of cars that violate traffic regulations.
这起生产事故令公司的安全部门警醒，应该加强设备的安全检查。
Zhè qǐ shēngchǎn shìgù lìng gōngsī de ānquán bùmén jǐngxǐng，yīnggāi jiāqiáng shèbèi de ānquán jiǎnchá。
This accident warns the security department of the company to be alert and improve security inspection on equipment.
时间长了，电线杆上的那些绝缘子也需要检修更换。
Shíjiān cháng le，diàn xiàng ān shàng de nàxiē juéyuánzǐ yě xūyào jiǎnxiū gēnghuàn。
After being in use for a long time, the insulators on the electric wire poles should be examined and replaced with new ones.
我的牙齿坏了，要去口腔科做检查！
Wǒ de yáchǐ huài le，yào qù kǒuqiāngkē zuò jiǎnchá！
My tooth doesn\'t feel well. I\'ll have an examination in the department of stomatology.

During the Spring Festival period, the train police should make routine checks regarding the identity of  the passengers.
这个部件经过量规的严格检验后没发现任何错误。
Zhège bùjiàn jīngguò liángguī de yángé jiǎnyàn hòu méi fāxiàn rènhé cuòwù。
The part has gone through careful check by a gauge, and there is nothing wrong with it.
机场的人太多，避免不了漏检的情况发生。

There are too many people in the airport, so occasional checking failures cannot be avoided.
仪器可以检测到他的心脏在有节奏地律动。
Yíqì kěyǐ jiǎncèdào tā de xīnzàng zài yǒu jiézòu de lǜdòng。
The instrument can detect his regular heartbeats.
他体检时裸视均为1.5。

The examination report of the doctor reveals that his skin is infected with mites.
经过检验这些都是米猪，不能继续出售了。
Jīngguò jiǎnyàn zhèxiē dōushì mǐzhū，bùnéng jìxù chūshòu le。

搜索引擎是按照关键词来排检相关信息的网络技术。
Sōusuǒ yǐnqíng shì ànzhào guānjiàncí lái páijiǎn xiāngguān xìnxī de wǎngluò jìshù。
A search engine is an internet technology which arranges and searches for related information according to key words.

Every time before using the autoclave, make sure to check whether the air valve is in good condition or not.
法医的尸检报告证明：这人死于窒息，是被掐死的。
Fǎyī de shījiǎn bàogào zhèngmíng：zhè rén sǐyú zhìxī，shì bèi qiāsǐ de。

医院的检查结果表明，她不幸患上了乳腺癌。

The examination report says that she has developed breast cancer.
新武器的实际杀伤力究竟有多大，还有待于进一步检验。

检查（某物）

我记得那个虚弱的害羞的小男孩。

Tā xūruò de dòngledòng，shìtú jǔqǐ yì zhī shǒu chákàn yíxià shāngkǒu。
他虚弱地动了动，试图举起一只手查看一下伤口。

The baby, three months premature and fragile, died four days later.

这孩子从小就体弱多病，长得像个豆芽菜。

Duìyú shìhé zìjǐ de gōngzuò jīhuì jiùyào nǔlì zhēngqǔ，gǒng ràng zhǐnéng shuōmíng nuòruò。
One should fight for suitable job opportunities. Handing it over to others on a silver platter is a sign of weakness.
他积食好几天了，身体很虚弱。
Tā jīshí hǎojǐtiān le，shēntǐ hěnxūruò。
He hasn\'t eaten anything for several days and is very weak now.
人们常常用“林黛玉”借指体弱多病的人。
Rénmen chángcháng yòng“Lín Dàiyù”jièzhǐ tǐruò duōbìng de rén。
Weak people are often called &quot;Lin daiyu&quot;.
清政府黑暗软弱，再加上税赋沉重，曾经逼得各地农民不断地抗粮起义。
Qīngzhèngfǔ hēi\'àn ruǎnruò，zài jiāshàng shuìfù chénzhòng，céngjīng bīdé gè dì nóngmín búduàn de kàngliáng qǐyì。
The government of the Qing Dynasty was corrupt and weak and also had heavy levies. Farmers from all over China rose up in revolt and resisted the grain levy one after another.
这位老媪体弱，百病缠身，幸好她的儿女都很孝顺。
Zhèwèi lǎoǎo tǐruò，bǎibìng chánshēn，xìnghǎo tā de érnǚ dōu hěnxiàoshùn。
The aged woman is sick with all kinds of diseases, but fortunately her children are filial.
他老病体弱，生活已经不能自理了。
Tā lǎobìng tǐruò，shēnghuó yǐjing bùnéng zìlǐ le。
He is old and sick, and unable to look after himself.
这个老妪体弱，百病缠身，幸好她的儿女都很孝顺。
Zhège lǎoyù tǐruò，bǎibìng chánshēn，xìnghǎo tā de érnǚ dōu hěnxiàoshùn。
The old woman was very weak, and illness-stricken. Luckily her children were very filial.
我们不要告诉她了，她羸弱的身体再也不能承受失去儿子的打击了。
Wǒmen búyào gàosù tā le，tā yíngruò de shēntǐ zài yě bùnéng chéngshòu shīqù érzi de dǎjī le。
We mustn\'t tell her. Her weak body can\'t bear the blow of her son\'s death.
古语说得好，良将手下无弱兵。
Gǔyǔ shuō de hǎo，liángjiàng shǒuxià wú ruòbīng。
The ancient saying says well, &quot;The underlings of an excellent leader won\'t be weak&quot;.
孩子小，模效能力强但分辨是非的能力弱，所以家长要当个好榜样。
Háizi xiǎo，móxiào nénglì qiáng dàn fēnbiàn shìfēi de nénglì ruò，suǒyǐ jiāzhǎng yào dāng gè hǎo bǎngyàng。
Children have strong imitation ability, but can not distinguish good from bad, so parents should set good examples.
这么嫩弱的花蕾怎么能经得起暴风雨的吹打呢？
Zhème nènruò de huālěi zěnme néng jīngdéqǐ bàofēngyǔ de chuīdǎ ne？
How could such a tender bud survive the thunderstorm?
在生意场上他还是个嫩弱的新手，还需要磨练。
Zài shēngyìchǎng shàng tā háishi gè nènruò de xīnshǒu，hái xūyào móliàn。
In business circles he is still a weak newcomer who needs more practice.
对方军队的实力较弱，没有几个强将。
Duìfāng jūnduì de shílì jiàoruò，méiyǒu jǐgè qiángjiàng。
With few able generals, the opposing troops\' strength was relatively weak.
你不要用强力欺压弱者。
Nǐ búyào yòng qiánglì qīyā ruòzhě。
You mustn\'t use force to bully and oppress the weak.
公司不分强弱，重在公平竞争。
Gōngsī bùfēn qiángruò，zhòngzài gōngpíng jìngzhēng。
Companies, strong or weak, shall focus on fair competition.
我倒不在乎光线的强弱，能看见就行。
Wǒ dào bú zàihu guāngxiàn de qiángruò，néng kànjiàn jiù xíng。
I don’t care much about the intensity of light, as long as I can see.
观众们倾向于同情比赛中的弱者。
Guānzhòngmen qīngxiàngyú tóngqíng bǐsài zhōng de ruòzhě.
Audiences are apt to sympathize with the weaker side in the competition.
你要培养自己坚强的意志，不要成为弱者。
Nǐ yào péiyǎng zìjǐ jiānqiáng de yìzhì，bú yào chéngwéi ruòzhě。
You should cultivate yourself to be strong-minded. Don\'t become a weak person.
我是色弱患者，分辨红色有些困难。
Wǒ shì sèruò huànzhě，fēnbiàn hóngsè yǒuxiē kùnnan。
I am a light achromatopsia sufferer, and it is a little difficult for me to see the color red.
这种花很娇贵，适应性极弱，种植有些难度。
Zhèzhǒng huā hěnjiāoguì，shìyīngxìng jíruò，zhòngzhí yǒuxiē nándù。
This flower is very fragile and not adaptable, so it\'s a bit difficult to grow it.
他瘦瘠的身体看起来似乎弱不禁风。
Tā shòují de shēntǐ kànqǐlái sìhū ruòbùjīnfēng。
His thin body looks extremely delicate.
与韩国队的比赛中，中国足球队员暴露了自身体能上的弱点。
Yǔ Hánguóduì de bǐsài zhōng，Zhōngguó zúqiú duìyuán bàolù le zìshēn tǐnéng shàng de ruòdiǎn。
The match against the Korean team exposed the Chinese footballers\' weakness in physique.
这孩子从小就体弱多病，这都是缺乏体育锻炼造成的。
Zhè háizi cóng xiǎo jiù tǐruò duōbìng，zhè dōushì quēfá tǐyù duànliàn zàochéng de。
The child has a weak constitution and is struck ill from time to time. Lack of exercise is part of the reason.
对方的后方防线较弱，是我们进攻的一个突破口。
Duìfāng de hòufāng fángxiàn jiàoruò，shì wǒmen jìngōng de yígè tūpòkǒu。
Our opponent\'s defensive line is comparatively loose at the back, so it is a point of attack in our offensive.
我真看不惯他这种唾面自干的懦弱性格。
Wǒ zhēn kànbúguàn tā zhèzhǒng tuòmiàn zìgān de nuòruò xìnggé。
I hate to see his weak personality that makes him simply turn the other cheek.
这个弱小的国家最终打败了外军的入侵。
Zhège ruòxiǎo de guójiā zuì zhōng dǎbài le wàijūn de rùqīn。
This small country successfully defended against the invasion of foreign troops in the end.
唯其弱小，我总是想尽一切办法保护他。
Wéiqí ruòxiǎo，wǒ zǒngshì xiǎngjìn yíqiè bànfǎ bǎohù tā。
It is only because he is so weak that I always try my best to protect him.
“五痨七伤”在中医学里范指身体虚弱。
“Wǔláo qīshāng”zài zhōngyīxué lǐ fànzhǐ shēntǐ xūruò。
In traditional Chinese medicine, &quot;five lesions and seven injuries&quot; refers to poor health and ailments.
这种封建思想一直蛀蚀着她那颗原本脆弱的心。
Zhèzhǒng fēngjiàn sīxiǎng yìzhí zhùshí zhe tā nà kē yuánběn cuìruò de xīn。
This kind of feudal thinking keeps decaying her fragile heart.
他表面上很壮健，其实弱不禁风。
Tā biǎomiàn shàng hěn zhuàngjiàn，qíshí ruòbùjīnfēng。
Though he seems strong in appearance, he is actually too weak to withstand a gust of wind.
他由于长期处于疲劳状态，现在有点精神衰弱。
Tā yóuyú chángqī chǔyú píláo zhuàngtài，xiànzài yǒu diǎn jīngshén shuāiruò。
He was long in a state of fatigue, and suffered from psychashenia.
我得了神经衰弱了，每天都失眠。
Wǒ déle shénjīngshuāiruò le，měitiān dōu shīmián。
I am suffering a nervous breakdown, and can\'t sleep every night.

búkěnshìruò
to not want to hold back in a competitive situation

乘兴作了一首诗
chéngxìng zuò le yìshǒushī 
improvise a poem while in a joyful mood
乘兴而来，兴尽而返
Chéngxìng\'érlái，xìngjìn\'érfǎn。
arrive in high spirits and depart well content
乘兴而来，败兴而归
Chéngxìng\'érlái，bàixìng\'érguī
set out cheerfully and come back disappointed
这首诗是乘一时的兴会写成的。
Zhèshǒushī shì chéngyìshí de xìnghuì xiěchéng de。
This poem was improvised on the spur of the moment.
乘兴而往，败兴而返

乘胜追击
chéngshèng zhuījī 
follow up a victory with hot pursuit

乘人之危
chéngrénzhīwēi
take advantage of sb\'s difficulties
乘人之危
to surprise an admission from someone
乘某人不备时使其招供
to catch sb off (their) guard
乘某人不备
Beware of the quiet ones; they always catch   you off guard.
Dāngxīn nàxiē shǎoyán-guǎyǔ de rén， tāmen wǎngwǎng huì chéngnǐbúbèi， chūqí-búyì。

chénglóngkuàixù
ideal son-in-law with a promising future (or of a high position)

阻留误点的乘客
zǔliú wùdiǎn de chéngkè 
held-up, delayed passengers
乘客
chéngkè
passenger
经过两个小时的搜寻，终于找到漏乘的乘客。
Jīngguò liǎnggè xiǎoshí de sōuxún，zhōng yú zhǎodào lòuchéng de chéngkè。

列车马上就要进站了，请乘客退后到安全线以外。
Lièchē mǎshàng jiùyào jìnzhàn le，qǐng chéngkè tuìhòu dào ānquánxiàn yǐwài。
The train is drawing into the station, please step back behind the safety line.
乘客登机前必须安检。
Chéngkè dēngjīqián bìxū ānjiǎn。
Passengers must go through security before boarding.
乘客的随身行李不能超过10公斤。
Chéngkè de suíshēn xíngli bùnéng chāoguò shígōngjīn。
Passengers may not bring more than ten kilograms of hand luggage on board.
航空公司满足了乘客的要求。
Hángkōnggōngsī mǎnzúle chéngkè de yāoqiú。
The airline company satisfied all the passengers\' requests.
等车站稳了乘客才可以下车。
